name: Montrachet Grand Cru
description: Montrachet wine is of unparalleled complexity, elegance and power make an exceptional wine!

name: Madonna delle Grazie Riserva Brunello di Montalcino
Clos Mireille Rosé (Coeur de Grain)
description: A bright personality, this wine is a reflection of its terroir on the coast facing the Mediterranean, a land of schists completely free of limestone. It has a pale pink robe with saffrony gold highlights. The powerful, elegant nose combines white fruits and wild strawberry, alongside citrus zest with light cardamom notes. Soft, firm structure in the mouth, balanced by crispiness with fruity notes and a touch of grapefruit.

name: Amarone della Valpolicella Monte Lodoletta
description: Subtle aromatic hints, that range from black cherry, blueberry to chocolate, anticipate the opulent expression of mature fruit that flows into the mouth with inadvertent persistence. Nuances of truffle, tobacco and new leather wrap around the finish.

name: La Tâche Grand Cru
description: La Tâche is elegance and rigour. Beneath the frequent hardness of its tannins, passion is aflame, restrained by an implacable, courtly elegance.

name: La Tâche Grand Cru
description: La Tâche is elegance and rigour. Beneath the frequent hardness of its tannins, passion is aflame, restrained by an implacable, courtly elegance.

name: Toscana
description: Intense ruby in colour. Fully ripe fruitiness with great freshness and complexity, delicate notes of vanilla and cocoa. On the palate, the wine is substantial and rich, with great density, and a rare tannic quality of silkiness and smoothness. Black fruit aromas are accompanied by a strong note of freshness and a long, elegant finish, which is prolonged with a delicate hint of cocoa.

name: IX Estate Red
description: Those elusive aromas are layered by the pervasive meatiness of the Cote Rotie clones, like succulent grilled duck, cured ham, blackberry cobbler, white peppercorns, road tar, and even a hint of orange zest. This wine is deliciously pliant and coating on the palate, and supported by fresh acidity.

name: Unico Reserva Especial Edición
description: The Reserva Especial is the wine with the greatest personality, it combines the complexity of the Único multiplied by different vintages and provides us with a huge range of aromas, pure elegance in a never-ending flow through the magic of a myth.

name: G. GOING, GOING, GONE
description: The bouquet displays spicy and smok y aromas, over a subtle background of fresh fruit, blueberry and cassis mingling with the scent of Havana tobacco. In a full-bodied attack, a multitude of dark berries and a hint of juniper show tremendous ripeness in a powerful, yet lovely balance. Deeply integrated tannins. Marvellous lengthy finish, offering extraordinary ageing potential.

name: G. GOING, GOING, GONE
description: The bouquet displays spicy and smok y aromas, over a subtle background of fresh fruit, blueberry and cassis mingling with the scent of Havana tobacco. In a full-bodied attack, a multitude of dark berries and a hint of juniper show tremendous ripeness in a powerful, yet lovely balance. Deeply integrated tannins. Marvellous lengthy finish, offering extraordinary ageing potential.

name: Viña El Pison
description: This is a wine with surprising expressivity; a wine with a natural elegance that provokes deep and changing feelings.

name: Opus One
description: Aromas of blackberry, rose petals, chocolate, and espresso accentuate fruity and earthy nuances. Round velvety tannins enrobe a silky texture with a touch of minerality. The flavours of dark fruit are enhanced by the acidity.

name: Pessac-Léognan Blanc (Grand Cru Classé de Graves)
description: The richness and power take over a palate with a welcome authority. This wine is rich, full-bodied and delicious.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Vieilles Vignes Françaises Blanc de Noirs Brut Champagne
description:
To the eye: deep gold ; the colour of a bright autumn morning.
To the nose: unmatched depth, power and concentration ; notes of wax, cognac and spices ;
candied aromas.
To the palate: a continuation of the olfactory flavours.

name: Pêra-Manca Tinto
description: A ripe and dense red, with powerful flavours of roasted plum, dark currant, cherry tart, and bittersweet chocolate. On the palate rich smoky notes, showing hints of dried beef and spice.

name: Richebourg Grand Cru
description: This immediate neighbor of la Romanée-Conti escorts Her Majesty with good-natured ribaldry. It is a king's musketeer who likes company, likes to laugh and to sing, to feel that the somewhat brutal strengh of his athlete's body is admired.

name: Vieilles Vignes Françaises Blanc de Noirs Brut Champagne
description:
To the eye: deep gold ; the colour of a bright autumn morning.
To the nose: unmatched depth, power and concentration ; notes of wax, cognac and spices ;
candied aromas.
To the palate: a continuation of the olfactory flavours.

name: La Faraona Bierzo (Corullón)
description: It feel rocky and mountainous, almost a little volcanic. The black fruit comes through with time in the glass. It’s huge and dense but also somehow manages to feel almost floral and light on its feet and quite elegant. Long and layered with a creamy texture and very dark dense fruit cut through by the perfect acidity and really youthful but ultra fine tannins.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)

description: The Reserva Especial is the wine with the greatest personality, it combines the complexity of the Único multiplied by different vintages and provides us with a huge range of aromas, pure elegance in a never-ending flow through the magic of a myth.

name: Pauillac (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
description: The supremely elegant nose displays red fruit aromas with touches of spice. On the palate, a smooth, creamy attack yields powerful, velvet tannins. The roundness is remarkable, giving the wine very attractive length. The finish reveals vanilla and chocolate aromas, with pleasant floral notes.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Unico (Gran Reserva)
description: This wine has an intense ripe cherry colour, with the lively edge of a wine that is always at its best. The aroma prevails with hints of roast from the wood, and touches of hazelnut from its oxidative evolution from its years in the cask. It has generous tastes of old but clean wood, with dry tannins that are pleasantly embittered by the oak, together with the sensation of its light sweetness of its alcohol. It is a pedigree wine with a long, lasting taste.

name: Unico (Gran Reserva)
description: This wine has an intense ripe cherry colour, with the lively edge of a wine that is always at its best. It has generous tastes of old but clean wood, with dry tannins that are pleasantly embittered by the oak, together with the sensation of its light sweetness of its alcohol. It is a pedigree wine with a long, lasting taste.

name: El Nido
description: It exhibits leathery, creme de cassis and pain grille characteristics, additional tannin and body, and a formidable palate. A wine of extraordinary extract and richness, it will be a target for old timers and reactionaries who will feel it is too internationally styled, but it is an eye-opening wine from an area better known for large cooperatives and mediocre quality.

name: Clon De La Familia
description: A grand wine of simple complexity, respecting its varietals (mulberry, blackberry …), in perfect symbiosis with fine-quality oak full of nuances and with the whole ensemble underlined by the land, with hints of minerals. Elegance from the chalk, character and structure from the clay and a mature mellowness that the wine gets from the pebbles, fill with subtle notes

name: Melbury
description: Aromas of cedarwood, barbecue spice, licorice, spring flowers, black currants and sweet kirsch jump from the glass of this dense purple-colored wine. A full-bodied texture, wonderful opulence, sweet velvety tannins and an extraordinary integration.

name: 'Giulio Ferrari' Riserva del Fondatore Collezione
description: The sensations on the palate are of energy, vibrancy and richness, and the flavour is impressive in its depth and intensity. The persistence on the finish is almost infinite, creating an overall profile of incomparable class and elegance.

name: De Buris Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva
Unico Reserva Especial Edición
description: The Reserva Especial is the wine with the greatest personality, it combines the complexity of the Único multiplied by different vintages and provides us with a huge range of aromas, pure elegance in a never-ending flow through the magic of a myth.

Clos d'Ambonnay
description: This color is consistent aroma exhaled caramel milk, barley sugar, cassis, red fruit jam and fruit jelly. In the mouth, wild fruits, the apple pie, currants, licorice mix their notes.

name: Sorì Tildìn (Barbaresco) Langhe
description: The rich body, subtle texture and fine, ripe tannins are typical for this wine of great finesse, the quintessential expression of the land and the Neb.

name: Pingus
description: Dark purple. Heady, mineral-tinged scents of red and dark berry preserves, potpourri and candied liquorice. Sweet and delineated, offering densely packed red fruit, mineral and floral flavours. Finishes very long and complex, with slow-building tannins.

name: 'Giulio Ferrari' Riserva del Fondatore
description: Elegant and well-balanced, with a velvety body and complex fruit: the nuances of acacia honey and hay blend well with the floral notes. The overall impact is aristocratic and of remarkable persistence.

name: 'Giulio Ferrari' Riserva del Fondatore
description: Elegant and well-balanced, with a velvety body and complex fruit: the nuances of acacia honey and hay blend well with the floral notes. The overall impact is aristocratic and of remarkable persistence.

name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Vigneto Alto TB
description: The grapes gathered and selected from the little vineyard called “Vigneto Alto” were really special.

name: Pieve Santa Restituta Rennina Brunello di Montalcino
description: Intense color. Very clean, rich aromas, with notes of forest fruits,raspberries and blackberries that evolve into delicate spice and floral perfumes. A wine of excellent body, with alcohol balanced by silky tannins,Rennina has very good structure and a lingering finish.

name: Next of Kyn
description: Syrah, 33% Grenache, 16% Touriga Nacional, and the rest Mourvèdre and Petite Sirah

description: A precise, pure combination of flowers, finely toasted hazelnuts, and candied citrus fruits. Silky, concentrated and flavoursome texture with an explosion of ripe fruit, red fruit, white chocolate and caramel. A powerful and elegant wine with a crescendo of sensations that attains a true harmony of flavours and perfect integration.

The nose is well-matched to a beautifully textured palate, incredibly complex flavors that cling to your gums, fine tannins that are completely covered by the fruit.

name: Côte-Rôtie La Mouline
description:
Visual : Deep ruby red with bright red highlights.
Nose : Small red fruits, blackberry and floral aromas of violets, powerful ... but fine aromatic intensity.
Palate : Entry into very soft mouth and beautiful harmony between the wine's bouquet and explosive richness due to the concentration of this wine.
Ensemble : female wine with voluptuous texture silky velvety, intensely aromatic.

name: Le Mesnil Blanc de Blancs (Cuvée S) Brut Champagne
Chambertin Grand Cru
description: Aromatically restrained with its airy and even elegant aromas of intensely floral, spicy and stony wild dark berry scents. Texturally gorgeous, equally mineral-influenced and muscularly broad-shouldered with impressively concentrated flavours that possess a Zen-like harmony and balance, moderately austere and hugely long finish.

name: Cristal Rosé Brut Champagne (Millésimé)
description: A salmon pink hue, with radiant highlights and incredible youth. An intense, rich, bewitching bouquet of red fruit and citrus zest. Aromas evolving from dried fruits, fresh almonds and frangipane, to notes of Tarte Tatin, oven-baked apples and caramel. Soft and silky on the palate with a marvelous harmony of flavour and concentration of fruit. The attack is fruity and crisp.

name: Barbaresco
description: Garnet in colour. Aromas of forest fruits, plums, liquorice, mineral and coffee scents on the nose. This wine has a dense structure, flavours of ripe fruit and a full body. It displays a long, complex finish with fine, silk-like tannins and good acidity.

name: Darmagi Langhe
description: Intense, deep red, almost black. Opulent layers of concentrated fruit. Excellent fruit with strong cassis flavors and impressive power on the palate carry through to the long finish with persistent soft tannins.

name: Unico (Gran Reserva)
description: This wine has an intense ripe cherry colour, with the lively edge of a wine that is always at its best. The aroma prevails with hints of roast from the wood, and touches of hazelnut from its oxidative evolution from its years in the cask. It has generous tastes of old but clean wood, with dry tannins that are pleasantly embittered by the oak, together with the sensation of its light sweetness of its alcohol. It is a pedigree wine with a long, lasting taste.

name: True Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Extraordinary deep flower tips are attached to Blueberry, Blackberry, crushed charcoal and camphor, beaten alcohol Glycerin is a fascinating display of palate, fruit, sweet tannin, Adequate acidity, and amazing balance and purity.

name: The Third Twin Nuestra Senor del Tercer Gemelo
Bolgheri Superiore
description:
Rich, silky and complex, Ornellaia Bolgheri Superiore is a red wine made from Petit Verdot in the foothills of the Mediterranean coast, Bolgheri, Italy. Expect silky tannins, bold, oaky notes of tobacco and chocolate, black fruit notes of blackberry and plum and deep, earthy flavors of leather and smoke that come together to create a complex flavor profile.

Perfect for sharing with friends at a dinner party, Ornellaia Bolgheri Superiore pairs beautifully with hearty dishes that include beef, lamb, game and veal, alongside rich, delicious pastas. Pop open and enjoy a compilation of indulgent flavors.

Ornellaia winery is located in Bolgheri, a wine region renowned for its ‘super Tuscan’ wines that include cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc and syrah. Super Tuscan wines are typically characterized by their ripe berry flavors, firm tannins and lasting finishes, which can definitely be said for Bolgheri Superiore.

For reviews, prices and vintages of this delicious red wine, trust in Vivino.

name: Madonna delle Grazie Brunello di Montalcino
Madonna delle Grazie Brunello di Montalcino
Il Caberlot
description: IL CABERLOT is made from 100% Caberlot, a variety believed to be a natural crossing of Cabernet Franc and Merlot. Fermentation in stainless steel, 22 months élevage in barrels from Burgundy, 16 months maturing in bottle prior to release. The wine is mainly bottled in magnums since the first vintage 1988, with an annual production of about 3.000 Mg.

description:

Nose: complex aromas of vanilla, almonds, dried fruit and lime.
A marked minerality (very typical of the soil).
Palate: rich wine of great roundness.
An elegant balance enhanced by a slight bitterness finish.

name: Côte-Rôtie La Turque
description: To the eye, its ruby red dress reveals pretty dark reflections . The nose of red berry, cherry and blackberry fruit is marked by a lingering aroma and an elegant intensity. The palate is soft with fine tannins and the same red fruit notes on the nose.

description: This is still very closed and youthful. Marvelous energy and power. Very, very concentrated nose. Full body. Very, very rich and almost solid on the palate at present. Real depth and dimension here. Potentially excellent.

description: The rich body, subtle texture and fine, ripe tannins are typical for this wine of great finesse, the quintessential expression of the land and the Neb.

name: Scharzhofberger Riesling Auslese
description: Opening notes of smoke and dried herb blow off to reveal layers of ripe tangerine, honey, lemon and lime on this aromatic medium-sweet Riesling. The palate is lusciously fruity, with rich, ripe flavors of mango and peach, but cut by piercing citrus acidity that penetrates. The finish lingers on and on.

name: Montrachet Grand Cru Marquis de Laguiche
description:
An authentic masterpiece! This wine should be regarded as the yardstick by which all other Burgundies should be judged. The colour has a splendid golden sheen. On the nose, a multitude of aromas are a pleasure to discover: floral notes of lily of the valley, peach blossom, exotic fruit, honey, grilled almonds, even exotic woods at times. On the palate,
the structure is dominated by a harmonious roundness which never imparts any heaviness. The aftertaste is exceptionally long and enhances the finesse of the whole. A glorious symphony of sensations!

name: Costa Russi (Barbaresco) Langhe
description: Elegance and crystal purity characterize this extremely complex and densely woven wine.

Clos de Tart Grand Cru Monopole
Next of Kyn

Côte-Rôtie La Mouline
description:
Visual : Deep ruby red with bright red highlights.
Nose : Small red fruits, blackberry and floral aromas of violets, powerful ... but fine aromatic intensity.
Palate : Entry into very soft mouth and beautiful harmony between the wine's bouquet and explosive richness due to the concentration of this wine.
Ensemble : female wine with voluptuous texture silky velvety, intensely aromatic.

name: Cristal Brut Champagne (Millésimé)
description: A precise, pure combination of flowers, finely toasted hazelnuts, and candied citrus fruits. Silky, concentrated and flavoursome texture with an explosion of ripe fruit, red fruit, white chocolate and caramel. A powerful and elegant wine with a crescendo of sensations that attains a true harmony of flavours and perfect integration.

It has generous tastes of old but clean wood, with dry tannins that are pleasantly embittered by the oak, together with the sensation of its light sweetness of its alcohol. name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Cobos Marchiori Estate Malbec
description: Aromas of black raspberry, anise and dark chocolate coat the mouth while notes of pencil lead and spice add complexity. Formidable structure and firm, chewy tannins.

name: Ligne de Crete Les Grandes Vignes Hermitage
Ligne de Crete Les Grandes Vignes Hermitage
Ligne de Crete Les Grandes Vignes Hermitage
CASK 23 Cabernet Sauvignon
description:
The heart of Stag’s Leap Wine Cellars is undoubtedly the estate vineyards and extraordinary care is taken to assure that a wine’s aroma, flavor, and texture convey a sense of place. As the difference between a good wine and a great one is often in the details, our viticultural practices are driven by extreme, even obsessive, attention to detail. Throughout the growing season and all the way through harvest, vines are cared for to achieve their optimum maturity level and ensure the ‘signature’ of the terroir is expressed to its fullest.

The goal is to create wines of classic beauty — wines with balance, complexity and harmony.

From the beginning, the Stag’s Leap Wine Cellars vision has been to create wines that speak to the place from which they come. These goals are realized in our three limited-production Estate-Grown Cabernet Sauvignons – CASK 23, S.L.V. and FAY—which are crafted from vineyards surrounding the winery.

The same classic style of the Estate wines is also expressed in the Napa Valley Collection, which consists of three wines: AVETA Sauvignon Blanc; KARIA Chardonnay and ARTEMIS Cabernet Sauvignon.

description:
To the eye: deep gold ; the colour of a bright autumn morning.
To the nose: unmatched depth, power and concentration ; notes of wax, cognac and spices ;

Opus One

description: PENDÓN is the Spanish for the pendant or banner attached to their lances to identify and distinguish the feudal lords and their forces in the Middle Ages (10-12th century). During the later part of the Middle Ages (13th to 15th century) the King bestowed Banners to the loyal towns and cities, bringing pride and prestige to the place.

This wine is deliciously pliant and coating on the palate, and supported by fresh acidity.

name: St. Eden
description: It offers up glorious aromas of cedarwood, creme de cassis, spice box, high class unsmoked cigar tobacco, roasted herbs and a hint of mocha. This compelling, singular, full-bodied, multilayered, sensational wine.

It’s huge and dense but also somehow manages to feel almost floral and light on its feet and quite elegant. Long and layered with a creamy texture and very dark dense fruit cut through by the perfect acidity and really youthful but ultra fine tannins.

Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard Chacayes Cabernet Franc
Viña El Pison
description: This is a wine with surprising expressivity; a wine with a natural elegance that provokes deep and changing feelings.

name: Conteisa Langhe
description: Expressive floral nose with notes of red berries, plums, licorice and spices. The Nebbiolo in Conteisa reflects the essence of the Cerequio terroir: sumptuous texture and a very refined character with perfectly integrated tannin.

description: Pinot Noir predominates, providing structure, breadth and robustness whilst Chardonnay contributes elegance, finesse and subtlety. Composed exclusively of grapes sourced from Grands Crus Pinot Noir and Chardonnay vineyards which were already under vine during Churchill's lifetime.

name: R.D Extra Brut Champagne (Récemment Dégorgé)
description:
To the eye: golden with subtle highlights.
To the nose: aromas of stewed ripe fruit, particularly quince, but also a discreet note of honey.
These are followed by roasted notes and cocoa, which give way to flavours of star anise and
nutmeg.
To the palate: full-bodied attack. Powerful but well-balanced, with persistent flavour. Mineral
finish with touches of lemon revealing a pleasing bitterness.

name: AAA
description: AAA 2004 boasts an intense black-blue, bright, clean color. The nose shows aromas young grapes with tremendous aromatic complexity, which is accompanied by notes of fresh mint and red roses. In the mouth amazed freshness, precision and elegance, displaying memories of black fruit, plum, undergrowth and spices. It is a meaty and structured wine, but with a very silky followed by a surprisingly long finish.

AAA

Pomerol
description: Deep, dark colour with hints of violet. Very fruity nose with dark berries (Morello cherries, blackcurrants) and fresh notes of mocha and toast. On the palate, the attack is refined and silky, with a powerful, balanced tannic structure. The texture is dense and very velvety thanks to the ripe, well-coated tannins. The finish is long with fruity notes, but is dominated by the quality of the tannins.

name: Dom Ruinart Blanc de Blancs Brut Champagne
Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard Gualtallary Cabernet Franc
description: Adrianna and I make it in honor of the old Pomerol style where Cabernet Franc was blended with the other Bordeaux varieties," says Alejandro.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Pauillac (Premier Grand Cru Classé)

The roundness is remarkable, giving the wine very attractive length. The finish reveals vanilla and chocolate aromas, with pleasant floral notes.

name: Sorì Tildìn (Barbaresco) Langhe
description: The rich body, subtle texture and fine, ripe tannins are typical for this wine of great finesse, the quintessential expression of the land and the Neb.

name: El Nido
description: It exhibits leathery, creme de cassis and pain grille characteristics, additional tannin and body, and a formidable palate. A wine of extraordinary extract and richness, it will be a target for old timers and reactionaries who will feel it is too internationally styled, but it is an eye-opening wine from an area better known for large cooperatives and mediocre quality.

name: Castillo Ygay Gran Reserva Especial Tinto
description: Intense cherry colour. Its nose exhibits an aromatic intensity of red fruits, floral notes of truffles, incense and spicy touches. Satin texture. Strength, elegant bouquet, fruity intensity, and impeccable balance.

name: Parcela El Picón Tinto
description: In the mouth, this wine is complex, with sweet tannins that envelop the palate and cover it with an exquisite roundness. Long lasting and persistent, it is a wine that opens itself up slowly to the senses as one tastes it.

name: Dedicato a Walter Bolgheri Superiore
description: Intense ruby red in colour, with complex aromas of ripe red fruit, balsamic spices and an elegant toasted note. It is exotic, spicy, full-bodied and harmonious, with ripe and well-developed tannins and a long, persistent finish.

name: Viña El Pison
description: This is a wine with surprising expressivity; a wine with a natural elegance that provokes deep and changing feelings.

name: Les Aubaguetes Priorat
description: Seductively floral, blackcurrant aromas. The palate opens with a blast of fruit juice, and then the Samsó comes through with clear, blueberry intensity.

name: Cirsion Rioja
description: This wine has a deep cherry color and background almost impenetrable. Very intense and complex, very slightly smoky, countless small black fruits and blackberries, violets finest substance, sweet spices and feel.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Hillside Select Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Aromas and flavours of dark cherry, black coffee, sweet vanilla and wet forest floor with rose petal, cranberry, blueberry, oregano, and sage.

Pingus

name: Gran Reserva
description:
Appearance: With an intense cherry and ruby, clean and bright.
Nose: Elegant and spicy with hints of vanilla, cocoa and toasted wood.
Palate: Tasty and persistent, with tannins well assembled fruit, long aftertaste.

name: Charmes Chambertin Grand Cru
description: The displays kirsch as well as candied cherry on the nose, which are allied to (or is that pitted against?) tart rhubarb on a bright, firm palate. This is suffused with both chalky and invigoratingly saline mineral manifestations; rose hip, cherry pit, and smoky black tea adding further, piquant complexity that follows into a long, lip-smacking finish. An extreme expression of its cru, it will strike some tasters as too lean, tart, and bitter, but I find it not quite too much of the above three and tonic-like in its fascination and vivacity

name: Harlequin
description: Brilliant ruby ​​red color tending to garnet when aging, good intensity. Enveloping feeling of richness and complexity; spices and higher alcohols alternate with flavors of jam and forest floor, then tobacco, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves carnation combined with minerality exalt the depth of the puzzle. Closes with persistence and persuasive sweetness.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
'Giulio Ferrari' Riserva del Fondatore
description: Elegant and well-balanced, with a velvety body and complex fruit: the nuances of acacia honey and hay blend well with the floral notes. The overall impact is aristocratic and of remarkable persistence.

name: Clos des Goisses Champagne
description: It has complex and concentrated with citrus, pear and herbs. Lovely depth here: taut, precise and still youthful, with subtle toast. Needs a lot of time, and this score may well climb.

name: Vintage
description: Deep golden colour and fine, vivacious bubbles, predicting fullness and elegance. Aromas of flowers in bloom, ripe and dried fruit, marzipan, gingerbread and citrus fruits. Flavours of hazelnut, nougat, citrus fruits, almonds, brioche and honey.

name: Sir Winston Churchill Brut Champagne
description: Pinot Noir predominates, providing structure, breadth and robustness whilst Chardonnay contributes elegance, finesse and subtlety. Composed exclusively of grapes sourced from Grands Crus Pinot Noir and Chardonnay vineyards which were already under vine during Churchill's lifetime.

name: Brut Champagne
description:
The immediate impression is of the mildness of the pure, airy, bright bouquet. A floral, fruity pastel tone then unfolds and quickly darkens into candied fruit, ripe hay and toasted notes, along with hints of licorice.

Dom Pérignon's Brut Champagne is a revered and iconic wine that represents the pinnacle of champagne craftsmanship. Produced by the renowned champagne house Moët & Chandon, Dom Pérignon is a symbol of luxury and excellence in the world of sparkling wines.

Dom Pérignon was named in honor of the 17th-century Benedictine monk Dom Pérignon, who is often credited with important contributions to champagne production. While the historical accuracy of these claims is debated, the name pays homage to the legacy of innovation and refinement in the art of winemaking.

Dom Pérignon Brut is typically made from a blend of Chardonnay and Pinot Noir grapes, which are carefully selected from the finest vineyards in the Champagne region of France. The grapes are hand-harvested to ensure the utmost quality.

The winemaking process for Dom Pérignon Brut is characterized by precision and traditional methods. After the initial fermentation, the wines are carefully blended to achieve the desired flavor profile. This cuvée is known for its meticulous attention to detail and the artistry of the cellar master in crafting a consistent and exceptional wine.

Dom Pérignon Brut Champagne is celebrated for its exquisite taste. It typically offers a pale gold or straw color with a delicate and persistent effervescence. On the nose, it reveals a complex bouquet of citrus fruits, floral notes, brioche, and subtle mineral undertones. The palate is marked by a fine balance of freshness, creaminess, and vivacity, with flavors of green apple, pear, toasted almond, and a long, lingering finish.

name: 'Giulio Ferrari' Riserva del Fondatore
description: Elegant and well-balanced, with a velvety body and complex fruit: the nuances of acacia honey and hay blend well with the floral notes. The overall impact is aristocratic and of remarkable persistence.

name: Clos Saint-Hilaire Brut Champagne
description:
Aroma: the wine's complex sensorial and mineral nose is characterised by deep grilled aromas conveyed by rich notes of ripe quince and orchard fruits.
Palate: you can detect a powerful, noble, and elegant dimension with the rare density of a magnificent year, intense and generous.

name: Vintage
description: Deep golden colour and fine, vivacious bubbles, predicting fullness and elegance. Aromas of flowers in bloom, ripe and dried fruit, marzipan, gingerbread and citrus fruits. Flavours of hazelnut, nougat, citrus fruits, almonds, brioche and honey.

name: Epokale
description: Very elegant and graceful, enormous depth, deeply aromatic, rich in content and essence, but with delicately flavoured with succulence and salty minerality. Highly refined residual sweetness in harmony with mild acidity and a nearly endless finish.

name: Le Mesnil Blanc de Blancs (Cuvée S) Brut Champagne
Madonna delle Grazie Brunello di Montalcino
La Landonne Côte-Rôtie
description:
To the eye, very intense color is strongly marked by purple tints.
The nose is complex and deep, develops fruity aromas dominated, supported by notes of liquorice and roasted coffee. With a dense and silky tannins, this wine, fleshy and full, offers a wide mouth and generous.
His final, great persistence, suggests a high aging potential.

name: Charmes Chambertin Grand Cru
description: The displays kirsch as well as candied cherry on the nose, which are allied to (or is that pitted against?) tart rhubarb on a bright, firm palate. This is suffused with both chalky and invigoratingly saline mineral manifestations; rose hip, cherry pit, and smoky black tea adding further, piquant complexity that follows into a long, lip-smacking finish. An extreme expression of its cru, it will strike some tasters as too lean, tart, and bitter, but I find it not quite too much of the above three and tonic-like in its fascination and vivacity

name: Cos d'Estournel
description: The call of faraway lands. As mysterious and intriguing as a lone adventurer returning from a solitary sail, Cos d’Estournel is slow to reveal itself. Little by little, it evokes stories of distant places, market stalls brimming with unfamiliar fruits, spices and wares, village festivities warmed by the joy of revelers and the setting sun, and sumptuous visions of ladies and their voluptuous curves. A myriad of scents, colors and tastes appeals to the senses. The Grand Vin of Cos d’Estournel is both demure and deliberately sensuous, a fascinating and elegant nectar.

name: Red
description: The flavours are deep, powerful, and explosive. Mocha, new leather, and licorice wrap around a core of dark, sumptuous fruit. This dense, powerful grape will require considerable patience.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: This is incredibly dark, with a deep purple hue and a generous, multifaceted aromatic expression. Blackberry, blueberry, and black currant dance with savory notes such as rosemary, black tea, olive and bresaola. Its many flavors are delivered on a rock solid framework, with rich but refined tannins and a cool impression, leather, pencil shavings, black tea, and smoke. This wine promises to be incredibly long-lived

name: Bâtard-Montrachet Grand Cru
description: It has light yellow. Very delicious nose of roasted hazelnuts, melted butter, lemon peel and vague hints of licorice root. Unlike many 2006s this wasn't particularly fat or exotic, but very well defined and very accessible. I enjoyed it tremendously and the wife and I emptied the bottle in about an hour.

name: Pessac-Léognan Blanc (Grand Cru Classé de Graves)
description: The richness and power take over a palate with a welcome authority. This wine is rich, full-bodied and delicious.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Pauillac (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
description: The supremely elegant nose displays red fruit aromas with touches of spice. On the palate, a smooth, creamy attack yields powerful, velvet tannins. The roundness is remarkable, giving the wine very attractive length. The finish reveals vanilla and chocolate aromas, with pleasant floral notes.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Grand Vin Pauillac (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Pauillac (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
description: The supremely elegant nose displays red fruit aromas with touches of spice. On the palate, a smooth, creamy attack yields powerful, velvet tannins. The roundness is remarkable, giving the wine very attractive length. The finish reveals vanilla and chocolate aromas, with pleasant floral notes.

Grand Vin de Château Palmer (Grand Cru Classé)
Cristal Brut Champagne (Millésimé)

Silky, concentrated and flavoursome texture with an explosion of ripe fruit, red fruit, white chocolate and caramel. A powerful and elegant wine with a crescendo of sensations that attains a true harmony of flavours and perfect integration.

Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Musigny Grand Cru (Cuveé Vieilles Vignes)

The nose is well-matched to a beautifully textured palate, incredibly complex flavors that cling to your gums, fine tannins that are completely covered by the fruit.

name: Rutherford
description: Dense and dark in color, with aromas of fresh cherry and blackberry layered with notes of violets, graphite, and hints of cedar spice.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A brilliant magenta color and expressive aromas of raspberry, plum, chocolate, brown spice and black pepper introduce the 2012 Estate Cabernet. A mouth-watering, sweet entry leads to a full-bodied wine that delivers rich, dark mountain fruit and plush tannins. This vintage promises early enjoyment.

name: Cerro Sur
description: Notes of blueberries, licorice, chocolate, cinnamon, and resin on the nose. On the palate, the blue and black fruits are joined by Santa Rosa plum, black tea, smoked meats and modeling clay. The wine, in its youth, is bright, muscular, and focused, and continues to open with time in the glass.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: This is incredibly dark, with a deep purple hue and a generous, multifaceted aromatic expression. Blackberry, blueberry, and black currant dance with savory notes such as rosemary, black tea, olive and bresaola. Its many flavors are delivered on a rock solid framework, with rich but refined tannins and a cool impression, leather, pencil shavings, black tea, and smoke. This wine promises to be incredibly long-lived

name: Costa Russi (Barbaresco) Langhe
description: Elegance and crystal purity characterize this extremely complex and densely woven wine.

name: Riserva vecchie viti dei Capalot e delle Brunate Barolo
Valpolicella Superiore Monte Lodoletta
description: This wine offers hints of blueberry, blackberry, cherry and chocolate which emerge gradually as the wine breathes. The potent tannins, which give structure to this product, are in perfect symbiosis with the velvety aromas of sweet spices and jam which envelop the palate and excite the senses.

name: Reserve
description: This blend has a stunning nose of tar, iron minerality,cassis, and dried flowers ~ especially lavender. On the palate,the wine is powerful and pure, repeating the note of cassis liqueur and black olive compote. All the elements of fruit, acidity, and tannin are perfectly balanced.

name: Cuvée Annamaria Clementi (Extra Brut)
description: It has shows toast, nuts, dried apricot, and minerals. This is fairly light bodied on the palate, with very good concentration and wonderful class. The long finish shows plenty of acidity.

name: 'Giulio Ferrari' Riserva del Fondatore
description: Elegant and well-balanced, with a velvety body and complex fruit: the nuances of acacia honey and hay blend well with the floral notes. The overall impact is aristocratic and of remarkable persistence.

name: 'Giulio Ferrari' Riserva del Fondatore
description: Elegant and well-balanced, with a velvety body and complex fruit: the nuances of acacia honey and hay blend well with the floral notes. The overall impact is aristocratic and of remarkable persistence.

name: Corton-Charlemagne Grand Cru Quintessence
description:
A powerful and mineral wine. The situation of the plot in altitude and composition (hard
limestone) give this wine a refreshing minerality and a unique, hence the name "Quintessence".

name: Blanc de Blancs Brut Millésimé Champagne
Barbaresco
description: Garnet in colour. Aromas of forest fruits, plums, liquorice, mineral and coffee scents on the nose. This wine has a dense structure, flavours of ripe fruit and a full body. It displays a long, complex finish with fine, silk-like tannins and good acidity.

name: Pieve Santa Restituta Sugarille Brunello di Montalcino
description: Intense, dark colour; rich,complex aromas of ripe fruit,violets and a slight hint of cloves and tobacco. Elegant structure and ripe, well-integrated tannins.

name: Vigneto Il Fornetto Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva
description: Rich nose with port-like character, but more earthy and fresh. Mocha, sweet cherries. Full-body, but suprisingly light for an Amarone. Nice clean fruit, cocoa, cherry-wood pipe. Smooth finish with a bourbon note and very clean. Overall elegant in the Amarone motif with a beautiful balance.

name: Cristal Brut Champagne (Millésimé)
description: A precise, pure combination of flowers, finely toasted hazelnuts, and candied citrus fruits. Silky, concentrated and flavoursome texture with an explosion of ripe fruit, red fruit, white chocolate and caramel. A powerful and elegant wine with a crescendo of sensations that attains a true harmony of flavours and perfect integration.

name: R.D Extra Brut Champagne (Récemment Dégorgé)
description:
To the eye: golden with subtle highlights.
To the nose: aromas of stewed ripe fruit, particularly quince, but also a discreet note of honey.
These are followed by roasted notes and cocoa, which give way to flavours of star anise and
nutmeg.
To the palate: full-bodied attack. Powerful but well-balanced, with persistent flavour. Mineral
finish with touches of lemon revealing a pleasing bitterness.

name: Fratta
description: Color rich ruby red with purple reflections on the nose the wine carries intense aromas of red berrei, bilberries and raspberries, along with spicy notes of cocoa and coffee in the mouth: a balanced expression of fine-grained tannins, and full-bodied, flavourful elegance.

name: Baffonero Maremma Toscana
description: Deep ruby ​​red. The nose is fruity with a variety of black fruits, in particular blackberry, blueberry and vanilla. In the glass the component aromatic changes evolving towards tobacco, coffee and chocolate. Complex in the mouth, full and robust with a freshness that makes it long and pleasant.

description:
Colour: Garnet red with orange-coloured highlights
Nose: Complex, very fruity, elegant, intense, spicy, with flowery touches
Taste: Excellent body with power and stuffing, demanding, masculine, long, full

name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Vigneto Alto TB
description: The grapes gathered and selected from the little vineyard called “Vigneto Alto” were really special.

name: Il Caberlot
description: IL CABERLOT is made from 100% Caberlot, a variety believed to be a natural crossing of Cabernet Franc and Merlot. Fermentation in stainless steel, 22 months élevage in barrels from Burgundy, 16 months maturing in bottle prior to release. The wine is mainly bottled in magnums since the first vintage 1988, with an annual production of about 3.000 Mg.

name: Ultima Hoja
description:
Colour: Intents deep red with purple and black highlights farming an incredibly attractive centre.
Nose : Ripe red and dark fruits like plums, raspberries, blackberries and gooseberries.Just the right combination of aromas of chocolate, caramel and coffee lent by the high-quality fine toast of French oak.
Palate: Sweet and very well-balanced. Robust and elegant body.

description: Aromas of blackberry, rose petals, chocolate, and espresso accentuate fruity and earthy nuances. Round velvety tannins enrobe a silky texture with a touch of minerality. The flavours of dark fruit are enhanced by the acidity.

name: Sperss Barolo
description: The nose shows a dark, pure and very focused fruit with classic hints of tar, licorice and a touch of truffles. Displays the austere character typical of Serralunga terroir: deep structure and lots of ripe tannins.

name: Cristal Rosé Brut Champagne (Millésimé)
description: A salmon pink hue, with radiant highlights and incredible youth. An intense, rich, bewitching bouquet of red fruit and citrus zest. Aromas evolving from dried fruits, fresh almonds and frangipane, to notes of Tarte Tatin, oven-baked apples and caramel. Soft and silky on the palate with a marvelous harmony of flavour and concentration of fruit. The attack is fruity and crisp.

name: Vin de Pays de l'Hérault Blanc
'Giulio Ferrari' Riserva del Fondatore
description: Elegant and well-balanced, with a velvety body and complex fruit: the nuances of acacia honey and hay blend well with the floral notes. The overall impact is aristocratic and of remarkable persistence.

name: Comtes de Champagne Blanc de Blancs
description: Its pure bouquet opens with a contrast between an already well-developed intensity and a finesse that reveals aromas of pears and white flowers. After a little time, the intensity presents the aromatic richness and maturity of a wine that is already expressing great potential.

name: Il Fuoriclasse Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva
Brunello di Montalcino
description: It is ruby-red in colour, and has a wide-ranging bouquet of flavours with undertones of vanilla, violet and morello cherry. Its flavour is strong and robust, and releases its best aromas after being decanted and left to breathe in a carafe (special wine jug).

name: Montrachet Grand Cru
description: In a rich, well-balanced and saturated slightly sweet flavor reveals fruity notes, citrus and mineral nuances, shades of oak. The wine has a nice long finish.

name: Clos Saint-Hilaire Brut Champagne
description:
Aroma: the wine's complex sensorial and mineral nose is characterised by deep grilled aromas conveyed by rich notes of ripe quince and orchard fruits.
Palate: you can detect a powerful, noble, and elegant dimension with the rare density of a magnificent year, intense and generous.

description: It has great strawberry and raspberry. Same red fruit on palate with some black berry hints, great spice and textures.

name: Montrachet Grand Cru
description: This is still very closed and youthful. Marvelous energy and power. Very, very concentrated nose. Full body. Very, very rich and almost solid on the palate at present. Real depth and dimension here. Potentially excellent.

name: De Buris Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva
Pieve Santa Restituta Sugarille Brunello di Montalcino
description: Intense, dark colour; rich,complex aromas of ripe fruit,violets and a slight hint of cloves and tobacco. Elegant structure and ripe, well-integrated tannins.

name: Epokale
description: Very elegant and graceful, enormous depth, deeply aromatic, rich in content and essence, but with delicately flavoured with succulence and salty minerality. Highly refined residual sweetness in harmony with mild acidity and a nearly endless finish.

name: Kurni Marche
description: Deep dark red shading to purple. The bouquet has wide primary aromas such as banana and vanilla, later it expresses red fruits and berries, tobacco, leather and oriental spices. It is well balanced, very lingering in the mouth.

name: Termanthia
description: This wine is deep, brillant purple. An extremely complex and elegant wine. Rich and multifarious, the nose is a sophisticated palette of aromas. Fresh raspberries, blackberries, black currants and other berry fruits enhance floral notes of violets and rose petals. Also present are hints of black pepper and toasted almonds that evolve into sweet spices such as cardamom and vanilla. Notes of truffles and a delicate minerality showcase the Toro terroir. On the palate, the wine is elegant and velvety, where firm and silky tannins are perfectly balanced giving a grand structure and weight. There is a progressive explosion of delicate, concentrated aromas, a profound evolution where everything enjoyed on the nose come forward again. Red and black berries, cacao and floral notes fill the mouth, leading to a lingering, complex finish with hints of spice, minerals and toasted notes.

name: Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé)
description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Barolo Riserva Monprivato Cà d'Morissio
description:
Colour: Garnet red with orange-coloured highlights
Nose: Complex, very fruity, elegant, intense, spicy, with flowery touches
Taste: Excellent body with power and stuffing, demanding, masculine, long, full

name: Ermitage Le Pavillon
description:
Colour: Deep garnet red, with purple highlights.
Nose: First : tar, slighly closed and smoky.Second : raspberry, blackberry, walnut.
Mouth: Complex, strong attack, it is a round, elegant wine, soft with a long aftertaste of liquorice and tobacco.

name: Amarone della Valpolicella Monte Lodoletta
description: Subtle aromatic hints, that range from black cherry, blueberry to chocolate, anticipate the opulent expression of mature fruit that flows into the mouth with inadvertent persistence. Nuances of truffle, tobacco and new leather wrap around the finish.

name: Sorì Tildìn (Barbaresco) Langhe
description: The rich body, subtle texture and fine, ripe tannins are typical for this wine of great finesse, the quintessential expression of the land and the Neb.

name: Bolgheri Superiore
description:
Rich, silky and complex, Ornellaia Bolgheri Superiore is a red wine made from Petit Verdot in the foothills of the Mediterranean coast, Bolgheri, Italy. Expect silky tannins, bold, oaky notes of tobacco and chocolate, black fruit notes of blackberry and plum and deep, earthy flavors of leather and smoke that come together to create a complex flavor profile.

Perfect for sharing with friends at a dinner party, Ornellaia Bolgheri Superiore pairs beautifully with hearty dishes that include beef, lamb, game and veal, alongside rich, delicious pastas. Pop open and enjoy a compilation of indulgent flavors.

Ornellaia winery is located in Bolgheri, a wine region renowned for its ‘super Tuscan’ wines that include cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc and syrah. Super Tuscan wines are typically characterized by their ripe berry flavors, firm tannins and lasting finishes, which can definitely be said for Bolgheri Superiore.

For reviews, prices and vintages of this delicious red wine, trust in Vivino.

description: La Grande Année is a refined, elegant wine with pretty, exotic notes of apricots, peaches, honey, flowers, smoke, and toasted oak. There is a notable clarity and precision, in a style that is generous and approachable.

name: Next of Kyn
description: Syrah, 33% Grenache, 16% Touriga Nacional, and the rest Mourvèdre and Petite Sirah

name: Campo Inferi Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva
Grand Vin Pauillac (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Dom Ruinart Blanc de Blancs Brut Champagne
Amarone della Valpolicella Monte Lodoletta
description: Subtle aromatic hints, that range from black cherry, blueberry to chocolate, anticipate the opulent expression of mature fruit that flows into the mouth with inadvertent persistence. Nuances of truffle, tobacco and new leather wrap around the finish.

name: Bâtard-Montrachet Grand Cru
description: The Bâtard Montrachet Grand Cru possesses an astonishing degree all the best qualities of white Burgundies: bright gold colour, rich and complex aromas recalling hazelnut and honey. Great depth and firmness but mellowness as well. Intense and persistent savour. This is a wine which needs time to reveal all its potential.

name: Barolo Riserva Bricco Voghera
description: In the vineyard of the Reserve Bricco Voghera the screws with more than 75 years producing grapes only. Concentration incredible. Dried flowers, dried fruit, freshness and great aromatic intensity. Black cherry, plum, blackberry with pink, purple and dark chocolate. Round tannins, generous, with an infinite length. Aging in oak and bottled prolonged. Elegance, charm and power. Each reserve is a reserve to remember.

name: Falletto Barolo Le Rocche del Falletto Riserva
Barolo Cannubi Boschis
description: This single-vineyard wine is typically dense and concentrated, but shows incredible harmony and balance. The medium-weight structure shows delightful and seductive notes of berries and cherries, with floral and mineral aspects. The finish is sweet and broad, with moderate, ripe tannins and long length.

name: Barbaresco
description: Garnet in colour. Aromas of forest fruits, plums, liquorice, mineral and coffee scents on the nose. This wine has a dense structure, flavours of ripe fruit and a full body. It displays a long, complex finish with fine, silk-like tannins and good acidity.

name: Montrachet Grand Cru
description: An emblematic wine that reveals its nobility in a subtle bouquet of white flowers, apple, ripe pear, spice and mineral notes. The palate is intense and velvety. A wine of great precision and exceptionally long.

name: Dedicato a Walter Bolgheri Superiore
description: Intense ruby red in colour, with complex aromas of ripe red fruit, balsamic spices and an elegant toasted note. It is exotic, spicy, full-bodied and harmonious, with ripe and well-developed tannins and a long, persistent finish.

name: Sperss Barolo
description: The nose shows a dark, pure and very focused fruit with classic hints of tar, licorice and a touch of truffles. Displays the austere character typical of Serralunga terroir: deep structure and lots of ripe tannins.

name: Costa Russi (Barbaresco) Langhe
description: Elegance and crystal purity characterize this extremely complex and densely woven wine.

name: Richebourg Grand Cru
description: Richebourg is a king of a wine: the colonnade of the Louvre, the Château of Versailles. You are impressed by its finesse, its length and its delicate sensations, endlessly changing. The fact that no element dominates the others enables you to appreciate all of its aromas, on the nose and on the palate.

name: Richebourg Grand Cru

The fact that no element dominates the others enables you to appreciate all of its aromas, on the nose and on the palate.

name: Brunello di Montalcino
description: It is ruby-red in colour, and has a wide-ranging bouquet of flavours with undertones of vanilla, violet and morello cherry. Its flavour is strong and robust, and releases its best aromas after being decanted and left to breathe in a carafe (special wine jug).

name: Spring Mountain District Cabernet Sauvignon
description: It is with rich aromatics brimming with cassis and floral tones, and a combination of ripe blackberry, focused minerality and a wonderful length on the palate.

name: Richebourg Grand Cru
description: Richebourg is a king of a wine: the colonnade of the Louvre, the Château of Versailles. You are impressed by its finesse, its length and its delicate sensations, endlessly changing. The fact that no element dominates the others enables you to appreciate all of its aromas, on the nose and on the palate.

Costa Russi (Barbaresco) Langhe
description: Elegance and crystal purity characterize this extremely complex and densely woven wine.

name: Guglielmi di Jago Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Sperss Barolo
description: The nose shows a dark, pure and very focused fruit with classic hints of tar, licorice and a touch of truffles. Displays the austere character typical of Serralunga terroir: deep structure and lots of ripe tannins.

name: Sperss Barolo
description: The nose shows a dark, pure and very focused fruit with classic hints of tar, licorice and a touch of truffles. Displays the austere character typical of Serralunga terroir: deep structure and lots of ripe tannins.

name: Vosne-Romanée 1er Cru 'Aux Brulées'
description: This is a powerful aristocrat of a wine, to be taken seriously. The impression is one of concentration, and the touch of spiciness it frequently offers us shows that's its name is well chosen. It is true to the 'terroir' of Vosne in that its strength is not expressed through aggressive elements. On the contrary, it is a well-balanced and complex wine.

name: Falletto Barolo Le Rocche del Falletto
Clos de Vougeot Grand Cru
description: The ruby red colour is magnificent and takes on a deeper hue with age. The aromas are intense and evoke raspberry and wild cherry, becoming more complex with age: undergrowth, truffle, candied fruit. A sublime structure, with refined tannins.

name: Scharzhofberger Riesling Auslese
description: Opening notes of smoke and dried herb blow off to reveal layers of ripe tangerine, honey, lemon and lime on this aromatic medium-sweet Riesling. The palate is lusciously fruity, with rich, ripe flavors of mango and peach, but cut by piercing citrus acidity that penetrates. The finish lingers on and on.

name: Barolo Riserva Monprivato Cà d'Morissio
description:
Colour: Garnet red with orange-coloured highlights
Nose: Complex, very fruity, elegant, intense, spicy, with flowery touches
Taste: Excellent body with power and stuffing, demanding, masculine, long, full

name: Cobos Chañares Estate Malbec
description: Expressive and full-bodied Malbec from Valle de Uco. It has a well-defined red ruby color with dark violet hues and presents aromas of wild herbs like thyme and rosemary, chamomile, violets, ripe black fruits, cassis and subtle hints of vanilla. The mouthfeel of this vibrant wine presents velvety tannins that continue to evolve and end in a pleasant and persistent finish.

name: Ermitage l'Ermite Blanc
description:
Colour: bright straw yellow. Clear.
Nose: complex aromas of vanilla, almonds, dried fruit and lime.
A marked minerality (very typical of the soil).
Palate: rich wine of great roundness.
An elegant balance enhanced by a slight bitterness finish.

name: Sorì Tildìn (Barbaresco) Langhe
description: The rich body, subtle texture and fine, ripe tannins are typical for this wine of great finesse, the quintessential expression of the land and the Neb.

name: Continuum Estate
description: Aromas of black currant, mulberry, and rose petal lead to cardamom, truffle and graphite flavors. A wine of exquisite power and elegance, the harmonious integration and balance make it delicious now, while assuring tremendous ageabilty.

name: Vigneto Bellavista Chianti Classico
description: Deep ruby ​​with purple highlights . At first glance out the powerfully spicy note typical of Bellavista perfectly blended with hints of ripe fruit : wild cherry , currant , licorice , mint , tobacco . Powerful , masculine where the polyphenolic component is its distinctiveness . The harmony and elegance make this wine an extraordinary example of a Super Chianti Classico .

name: Asili Barbaresco Vecchie Viti
description: It has limestone site overlooking the river Tanaro below, which combines to give us a beautifully fine, scented, spicy red fruit nose, all prim and pretty, with prefect poise.

name: Barbaresco
description: Garnet in colour. Aromas of forest fruits, plums, liquorice, mineral and coffee scents on the nose. This wine has a dense structure, flavours of ripe fruit and a full body. It displays a long, complex finish with fine, silk-like tannins and good acidity.

name: Barolo Riserva Monprivato Cà d'Morissio
description:
Colour: Garnet red with orange-coloured highlights
Nose: Complex, very fruity, elegant, intense, spicy, with flowery touches
Taste: Excellent body with power and stuffing, demanding, masculine, long, full

name: Pira Barolo
description: It has fruit, spice and earth...of acid and tannin. The length, the elegance, the clarity of expression is absolutely stunning.

name: Castillo Ygay Gran Reserva Especial Tinto
description: Intense cherry colour. Its nose exhibits an aromatic intensity of red fruits, floral notes of truffles, incense and spicy touches. Satin texture. Strength, elegant bouquet, fruity intensity, and impeccable balance.

name: Barbaresco
description: Garnet in colour. Aromas of forest fruits, plums, liquorice, mineral and coffee scents on the nose. This wine has a dense structure, flavours of ripe fruit and a full body. It displays a long, complex finish with fine, silk-like tannins and good acidity.

name: Falletto Barolo Le Rocche del Falletto Riserva
Bolgheri Superiore
description:
Rich, silky and complex, Ornellaia Bolgheri Superiore is a red wine made from Petit Verdot in the foothills of the Mediterranean coast, Bolgheri, Italy. Expect silky tannins, bold, oaky notes of tobacco and chocolate, black fruit notes of blackberry and plum and deep, earthy flavors of leather and smoke that come together to create a complex flavor profile.

Perfect for sharing with friends at a dinner party, Ornellaia Bolgheri Superiore pairs beautifully with hearty dishes that include beef, lamb, game and veal, alongside rich, delicious pastas. Pop open and enjoy a compilation of indulgent flavors.

Ornellaia winery is located in Bolgheri, a wine region renowned for its ‘super Tuscan’ wines that include cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc and syrah. Super Tuscan wines are typically characterized by their ripe berry flavors, firm tannins and lasting finishes, which can definitely be said for Bolgheri Superiore.

For reviews, prices and vintages of this delicious red wine, trust in Vivino.

name: Vigneto Il Fornetto Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva
description: Rich nose with port-like character, but more earthy and fresh. Mocha, sweet cherries. Full-body, but suprisingly light for an Amarone. Nice clean fruit, cocoa, cherry-wood pipe. Smooth finish with a bourbon note and very clean. Overall elegant in the Amarone motif with a beautiful balance.

name: Poggio Al Vento Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
description:
Deep ruby red. Ample, intense and persistent. The typical aromas of the great Sangiovese are enhanced by the spicy oak hints acquired during the long ageing in the barrels.
Union of power and elegance. The excellent structure envelopes the soft and ripe tannins perfectly balanced with a pleasant acidity. Long, structured and fruity aftertaste.

name: Fratta
description: Color rich ruby red with purple reflections on the nose the wine carries intense aromas of red berrei, bilberries and raspberries, along with spicy notes of cocoa and coffee in the mouth: a balanced expression of fine-grained tannins, and full-bodied, flavourful elegance.

name: Pieve Santa Restituta Sugarille Brunello di Montalcino
description: Intense, dark colour; rich,complex aromas of ripe fruit,violets and a slight hint of cloves and tobacco. Elegant structure and ripe, well-integrated tannins.

name: Brunello di Montalcino
description: It is ruby-red in colour, and has a wide-ranging bouquet of flavours with undertones of vanilla, violet and morello cherry. Its flavour is strong and robust, and releases its best aromas after being decanted and left to breathe in a carafe (special wine jug).

name: Baffonero Maremma Toscana
description: Deep ruby ​​red. The nose is fruity with a variety of black fruits, in particular blackberry, blueberry and vanilla. In the glass the component aromatic changes evolving towards tobacco, coffee and chocolate. Complex in the mouth, full and robust with a freshness that makes it long and pleasant.

name: Dedicato a Walter Bolgheri Superiore
description: Intense ruby red in colour, with complex aromas of ripe red fruit, balsamic spices and an elegant toasted note. It is exotic, spicy, full-bodied and harmonious, with ripe and well-developed tannins and a long, persistent finish.

name: Vintage
description: Deep golden colour and fine, vivacious bubbles, predicting fullness and elegance. Aromas of flowers in bloom, ripe and dried fruit, marzipan, gingerbread and citrus fruits. Flavours of hazelnut, nougat, citrus fruits, almonds, brioche and honey.

name: Cristal Rosé Brut Champagne (Millésimé)
description: A salmon pink hue, with radiant highlights and incredible youth. An intense, rich, bewitching bouquet of red fruit and citrus zest. Aromas evolving from dried fruits, fresh almonds and frangipane, to notes of Tarte Tatin, oven-baked apples and caramel. Soft and silky on the palate with a marvelous harmony of flavour and concentration of fruit. The attack is fruity and crisp.

name: Chambertin Clos de Bèze Grand Cru
Cristal Brut Champagne (Millésimé)
description: A precise, pure combination of flowers, finely toasted hazelnuts, and candied citrus fruits. Silky, concentrated and flavoursome texture with an explosion of ripe fruit, red fruit, white chocolate and caramel. A powerful and elegant wine with a crescendo of sensations that attains a true harmony of flavours and perfect integration.

name: Musigny Grand Cru (Cuveé Vieilles Vignes)
description: Deep, saturated-cherry red. Wow, what a nose; the glass doesn't even need a swirl to give up chocolate- and creme-brulee-covered, red-cherry fruit. Super complexity. The nose is well-matched to a beautifully textured palate, incredibly complex flavors that cling to your gums, fine tannins that are completely covered by the fruit.

name: Cristal Brut Champagne (Millésimé)
description: A precise, pure combination of flowers, finely toasted hazelnuts, and candied citrus fruits. name: Barolo Riserva Villero
description: Frutta rossa scura, aromi di cuoio, tabacco, fumo e mentolo si animano in un ricco e sensuale Barolo che cattura l’essenza di questo cru.

name: Richebourg Grand Cru
description: Its purple colour reflects like a jewel of purity. The aromas are extremely complex and express an entire spectrum. The floral aspect is characterised by notes of peony, roses and violets. The spicy aspect by notes of licorice, vanilla and coriander. The fruit aspect by notes of red and black fruit (raspberry, black currant) The vegetal aspect by notes of undergrowth, methyl, fresh cut herbs.

A well-integrated balanced of its components give this wine a far from normal pleasureableness.

Ermitage Le Pavillon
description:
Colour: Deep garnet red, with purple highlights.
Nose: First : tar, slighly closed and smoky.Second : raspberry, blackberry, walnut.
Mouth: Complex, strong attack, it is a round, elegant wine, soft with a long aftertaste of liquorice and tobacco.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Clos de Vougeot Grand Cru
description: Is this a wine which expresses the Cistercian rigour which gave birth to it? No, its image is rather that of a refined gentleman: the grapes mature early here, but still give wines of great finesse, with a lace-like texture, which lines the palate, with superb length.

Richebourg Grand Cru

description: Aromatically restrained with its airy and even elegant aromas of intensely floral, spicy and stony wild dark berry scents. Texturally gorgeous, equally mineral-influenced and muscularly broad-shouldered with impressively concentrated flavours that possess a Zen-like harmony and balance, moderately austere and hugely long finish.

name: Clos des Goisses Juste Rosé Champagne
description: It has a fine, complex and elegant nose with notes of summer berries (raspberry, strawberry) and almond milk,as well as powerful aromas of candied pink grapefruit peel.

name: Reserve
description: This blend has a stunning nose of tar, iron minerality,cassis, and dried flowers ~ especially lavender. On the palate,the wine is powerful and pure, repeating the note of cassis liqueur and black olive compote. All the elements of fruit, acidity, and tannin are perfectly balanced.

name: Grange
description: Notes of smoked meats, black currants, blackberries, earth, black truffles, licorice and various spices. The taste is filled with ripe tannins, great intensity and fullness, added good acidity which together result in a complex aftertaste.

name: Sorte O Soro Val do Bibei
Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Vigneto Alto TB
description: The grapes gathered and selected from the little vineyard called “Vigneto Alto” were really special.

name: Blanc des Millénaires
description: It has balanced with a richness and distinct pastry aromas expressing full buttery notes, intense cinnamon and vanilla spice.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Pieve Santa Restituta Sugarille Brunello di Montalcino
description: Intense, dark colour; rich,complex aromas of ripe fruit,violets and a slight hint of cloves and tobacco. Elegant structure and ripe, well-integrated tannins.

name: Clos Mireille Rosé (Coeur de Grain)
description: A bright personality, this wine is a reflection of its terroir on the coast facing the Mediterranean, a land of schists completely free of limestone. It has a pale pink robe with saffrony gold highlights. The powerful, elegant nose combines white fruits and wild strawberry, alongside citrus zest with light cardamom notes. Soft, firm structure in the mouth, balanced by crispiness with fruity notes and a touch of grapefruit.

name: El Nido
description: It exhibits leathery, creme de cassis and pain grille characteristics, additional tannin and body, and a formidable palate. A wine of extraordinary extract and richness, it will be a target for old timers and reactionaries who will feel it is too internationally styled, but it is an eye-opening wine from an area better known for large cooperatives and mediocre quality.

name: Ligne de Crete Les Grandes Vignes Hermitage
Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard Chacayes Cabernet Franc
Cava Enoteca Finca de L'Origen Brut Nature
AAA
description: AAA 2004 boasts an intense black-blue, bright, clean color. The nose shows aromas young grapes with tremendous aromatic complexity, which is accompanied by notes of fresh mint and red roses. In the mouth amazed freshness, precision and elegance, displaying memories of black fruit, plum, undergrowth and spices. It is a meaty and structured wine, but with a very silky followed by a surprisingly long finish.
