Nose: Elegant and spicy with hints of vanilla, cocoa and toasted wood.
Palate: Tasty and persistent, with tannins well assembled fruit, long aftertaste.

name: Rutherford
description: Dense and dark in color, with aromas of fresh cherry and blackberry layered with notes of violets, graphite, and hints of cedar spice.

name: Il Fuoriclasse Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva
Campo Inferi Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva
Cobos Chañares Estate Malbec
description: Expressive and full-bodied Malbec from Valle de Uco. It has a well-defined red ruby color with dark violet hues and presents aromas of wild herbs like thyme and rosemary, chamomile, violets, ripe black fruits, cassis and subtle hints of vanilla. The mouthfeel of this vibrant wine presents velvety tannins that continue to evolve and end in a pleasant and persistent finish.

name: Fratta
description: Color rich ruby red with purple reflections on the nose the wine carries intense aromas of red berrei, bilberries and raspberries, along with spicy notes of cocoa and coffee in the mouth: a balanced expression of fine-grained tannins, and full-bodied, flavourful elegance.

name: RdP Spätburgunder
description: It is bouquet smells strongly after dark cherries, ripe plum, raisins, the finest chocolate and a hint of vanilla . On the palate very focused. These meaty, velvety creamy, dense fruit and wonderful depth and fullness. These are supported by a fine flavor with toasted toasty and beautiful minerality. Overall very complex, layered and a great, long finish. Just a terrific wine

name: Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé)
description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Kurni Marche
description: Deep dark red shading to purple. The bouquet has wide primary aromas such as banana and vanilla, later it expresses red fruits and berries, tobacco, leather and oriental spices. It is well balanced, very lingering in the mouth.

name: Cuvée Annamaria Clementi (Extra Brut)
description: It has shows toast, nuts, dried apricot, and minerals. This is fairly light bodied on the palate, with very good concentration and wonderful class. The long finish shows plenty of acidity.

name: Eden Chenin Blanc
description: Displays peach blossom, greengage, lime, green apple, white peach, pineapple, ginger, angelica and peppery spiciness. The palate shows notes of quince, granadilla, kumquat, mandarin orange, melon, pear and lemon-meringue against a backdrop of steely minerality. Hints of roasted hazelnuts and almonds add to the complexity of the palate. The wine is exceptionally linear and fresh with a fine texture and finishes with notes of fennel and the ginger spiciness promised by the nose.

name: MR de Compostella Mvemve
description: Deep, dark ruby colour. Blackcurrant and black cherry fruit with hints of violets, cedar and cinnamon. Mineral, black berry fruit, and dark chocolate on the finish.

name: Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard Chacayes Cabernet Franc
Finca Bella Vista Malbec
description: Bright, medium ruby. Vibrant, strong aromas of blackberry, violet, dark raspberry and crushed stone. Very well built fine tannins, with superconcentrated body plus a smooth noticeable graphite power. Utterly silky finish with a perfumed back end.

name: Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard Gualtallary Cabernet Franc
description: Adrianna and I make it in honor of the old Pomerol style where Cabernet Franc was blended with the other Bordeaux varieties," says Alejandro.

name: Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard Gualtallary Cabernet Franc
description: Adrianna and I make it in honor of the old Pomerol style where Cabernet Franc was blended with the other Bordeaux varieties," says Alejandro.

name: Preta Cuvée David Booth Grande Reserva
description: Generous nose with very intense aroma of crushed blackberries and blueberries. Complexity comes from deep floral scents and toasted barrel notes. Powerful mouthfeel from firm very ripe tannins and a finish that is complex and sustained.

name: CM Tinto
description: On the nose, very fresh and elegant with wild black fruit notes and black cherries balanced with enticing nuances of "liquorice", and the aroma complexed by very discrete wood notes.The palate is warm and spicy with firm tannins soft texture, very persistent finish.

name: La Porte du Ciel Languedoc La Clape
Campo del Titari Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva
description: Deep, rich, opaque ruby color. Its intense and charming bouquet reveal notes of cherries, raspberries and redcurrants, mingling with faint hints of vanilla. On the palate, it unleashes a powerful and robust structure, accompanied, though, by elegant acidity.

name: The Echo Of G
description:
Dark, ruby red colour, dense and
complex, rich bouquet of ripe cherries, blackcurrants and blackberries, underpinned
by fine zest, havanna tobacco, grisons and roast aromas. Powerful and
athletic on the palate, full-bodied and intense, it impresses with ripe, concentrated
fruit, freshness and succulence. A classic and complex wine with reminiscences
of Pomerol and Châteauneuf, which ends in a persistent, fulminant
finish.

name: Pharaon
description: Supremely intense and concentrated aromatics of wild berry jam, licorice, and exotic spices explode out of the glass. The entry is a powerful, yet concentrated shot of crushed boysenberry, anise, and blueberry, with delicate floral and mountain herb notes in the background to add intrigue. Supplanted with the most delicate tannins, the finish lasts seemingly forever.

name: Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
description: It contains elegant and well balanced, powerful, but clean and smooth and a dynamic rising finale.

name: La Mala Ribera del Duero
description: Black cherry colour. This is an aromatic wine with a wide variety of aromas of herbs, such as lavender, rosemary and camomile, combined with ripe red and black forest fruit and slight hints of coffee and spices. It has a smooth and aromatic mid palate accompanied by a tannin with a fine granular texture. Good acidity and balance.

name: PS (Pagos Seleccionados)
description: Very intense purple colour. Aromas of liquorice, tobacco, noble woods, spices, pain grillé and black berries. In the mouth, this wine offers density and structure, with plenty of silky tannins that provide finesse and elegance. Acidity and alcohol balance each other in a harmonious and lengthy wine.

name: Malleolus de Sanchomartin
description: An intense, deep cherry-red colour. Complex and elegant aromas, with subtle, floral notes that accompany the liquorice, mulberry and blackcurrant. The balsamic notes from the oak are perfectly integrated into the ensemble of the wine. On the palette it is warm and sweet, with balanced acidity and a great quality tannin that caresses the palette. A warm finish that goes on forever.

name: Les Sentius d'En Joan Bta. Domènech
Tinto
description:
Smooth and deep ruby in color, Pago de Carraovejas Tinto is a robust red wine from the wine region of Ribera del Duero, Spain, which is located at the southern tip of the province of Burgos. It’s renowned for its cherry, blackberry and vanilla notes, alongside low acidity and low tannins. Perfect for wine connoisseurs and novices alike, it’s the perfect bottle to share alongside friends over a delicious dinner.

As for pairings, this wine is an excellent choice to enjoy alongside meaty dishes that involve beef, lamb and game, so it’s perfect for sipping alongside a succulent steak dinner on date night. Made from the Tempranillo grape, this wine is rated highly across all of its vintages, however its 2018 vintage featured in the Top 25 Spanish Ribera del Duero red wines in the United States right now, so that might be a bottle you want to get your hands on. Additionally, its 2016 vintage rates better than any other year, so it’s fair to say this wine is an all round good choice, regardless of the vintage you choose.

Read on for more reviews and pricing on Pago de Carraovejas Tinto at Vivino.

name: Tinto
description:
Smooth and deep ruby in color, Pago de Carraovejas Tinto is a robust red wine from the wine region of Ribera del Duero, Spain, which is located at the southern tip of the province of Burgos. It’s renowned for its cherry, blackberry and vanilla notes, alongside low acidity and low tannins. Perfect for wine connoisseurs and novices alike, it’s the perfect bottle to share alongside friends over a delicious dinner.

As for pairings, this wine is an excellent choice to enjoy alongside meaty dishes that involve beef, lamb and game, so it’s perfect for sipping alongside a succulent steak dinner on date night. Made from the Tempranillo grape, this wine is rated highly across all of its vintages, however its 2018 vintage featured in the Top 25 Spanish Ribera del Duero red wines in the United States right now, so that might be a bottle you want to get your hands on. Additionally, its 2016 vintage rates better than any other year, so it’s fair to say this wine is an all round good choice, regardless of the vintage you choose.

Read on for more reviews and pricing on Pago de Carraovejas Tinto at Vivino.

name: Amour de Deutz Millésimé Brut Champagne
description: It boasts the impish charm of youth, which will gradually softens over the years to reveal the grapes quintessential qualitites in a harmony for all the senses

name: Territorio Luthier Reserva
description: Garnet red color with medium high density with violet edge .Balsamic, mineral, black fruit, red fruit, spicy, fine and cacao. Well-defined wine with character and personality.

name: Sed de Caná
description: Aromas on elegant,mineral, balsamic and spicy notes. This wine is wide,juicy and voluminous, and with a fine tour full of expression and balance. Long end.

name: Coeur d'Or Millésimé Dorée Champagne
description: Straw yellow colour with hints of gold and a very fine sparkle, the aroma is intense and complex with notes of white fruit interspersed with elegant hints of yeast beneath touches of brioche.

name: Turó d’en Mota
description: Toast and brioche on the nose, very elegant and complete on the palate; mineral and winey, rich and sleek with a lovely texture. Notes of coriander persist; complex and compelling.

name: Douro Coche Branco
description: It has aromas of great complexity, luxurious and very elegant in the toasty notes. It has a citrus profile with beautiful floral notes. On the palate, with firm acidity and fresh, is very elegant in fresh fruit notes and has a slightly salty profile. Great volume, with a good concentration, where the barrel is in full harmony with the wine, with dried fruit memories. Very delicate, fine and persistent finish.

name: La Garnatxa D En Pitu Gran Reserva Garnatxa Roja Dolça
Clio
description: The wine exhibits a glass-coating opaque purple color with an expressive nose of pain grille, underbrush, brier, mineral, blueberry and blackberry .It is an opulent wine with great density, savory flavours and a lengthy finish.

name: Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard Agrelo Cabernet Franc
description: "Adrianna and I make it in honor of the old Pomerol style where Cabernet Franc was blended with the other Bordeaux varieties," Alejandro Vigil.

name: Félix Callejo (Viñedos de la Familia)
description: Cherry red color with garnet rim. Intense nose, aromas of ripe fruit, blueberry, spicy, rosemary, clove, balsamic, ink, creamy oak. The mid-palate is powerful and tasty, fruity sensations appear and aromatic nose, plus chocolate, ripe tannins, and a long and persistent end.

name: Priorat
description: Aromas of red and black fruits, layered with toasted and spices. Hints of dark chocolate and soft, earthy coffee bean notes develop, alongside a few touches of cinnamon. The palate shows maturity and charisma.

name: Brunello di Montalcino  Montosoli
description: It has a deep ruby red colour which turns a garnet red with age. Its bouquet has outstanding character with hints of black cherry, blackberries, raspberries, violet, liquorice, vanilla and a slight accent of pink peppercorn.

name: Gran Reserva 890
description: Tile red colour. The initial aroma is both complex and powerful. In the mouth the wine is powerful and balanced with smooth and silky tannins coupled with a noteworthy light acidity. The aftertaste is full and very complex leaving the flavours full on the palate.

name: Bibbona
description: Cherries, black currants, blackberries, chocolate, coffee, black pepper. Velvety tannins and a good acidity give backbone and structure to the rich flavors. The wine has a seamless balance with a long and fine finish.

name: Rioja Gran Reserva 904
description: Typical red colour, with brick tones on the edge of the glass. Medium robe, clear and brilliant. Long, penetrating and complex bouquet, with hints of spices, balsam and old leather against a background of ripe fruit. Well-structured to the palate, with silky, rich tannins, ending with some acidity so this wine will keep well. Excellent aftertaste, with persistent balsamic and spicy hints.

name: Grano a Grano Graciano
description: The nose has a high aromatic intensity. Red fruit aromas appear along with peach and plum.

name: Reserva Especial
description: Lively and deep dark red, almost black.Very mature and harmonious nose with black fruit like plum notes, liquorice and honey and roasted elegant touches.The mouth is silky and refined with a black fruit after-taste, long and intense on the palate and persistent. The structure composed by intense tannins is elegant and well-constituted, and denote longevity.Well-matured and concentrated wine with mineral notes, honest and elegant style.

name: Reserva Especial
description: Lively and deep dark red, almost black.Very mature and harmonious nose with black fruit like plum notes, liquorice and honey and roasted elegant touches.The mouth is silky and refined with a black fruit after-taste, long and intense on the palate and persistent. The structure composed by intense tannins is elegant and well-constituted, and denote longevity.Well-matured and concentrated wine with mineral notes, honest and elegant style.

name: Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard Agrelo Cabernet Franc
description: "Adrianna and I make it in honor of the old Pomerol style where Cabernet Franc was blended with the other Bordeaux varieties," Alejandro Vigil.

name: Incógnito
description: Dark, brooding, stone fruit aromas of plums and prunes with a touch of toasty oak. Seamless palate with layers of fruits. Sweet and silky, nicely textured, full-bodied, densely flavoured with fine and supple tannins on the finish.

name: RWT Shiraz
description: Deep, dark magenta. On the nose, dark spices and saturated fresh regional Shiraz fruits with telltale wafts of blueberry, blackberry, liquorice and black olive. Secondary notes of rosemary, peppercorn, thyme, juices of beef - verging on that of a terrine/corned beef. Subtle cedary French oak in the background.

name: Finca Garbet
description: Ruby color high layer. It is a wine with great aromatic range reminiscent of the farm from which it comes (Mediterranean herbs, spices, fruits, balsamic and minerals). The palate is fresh, rich, enveloping and ripe tannins. It has a long aftertaste and has a very good aging potential.

name: Llanos del Almendro Ribera del Duero
Quinta do Monte Xisto Tinto
description: Bright and luminous in appearance, his nose foreshadows frankness, projecting us into the Fifth universe. The more we get involved we are surprised by new fruity and wild aromas, supported by an elegant and balanced structure.

name: El Titán del Bendito
description: Cherry color, garnet rim. Aroma ripe fruit, spicy, oak creamy, toasted, complex, chocolate, earthy. Mouth powerful, tasty, toasted, ripe tannins, round, balanced, elegant.

name: Ribera del Duero
description: It appears with hints of roast from the grape and top-quality wood. On the palate, the sweetened tannins of the concentrated black fruits blend with the dry creamy tannins of the French oak. It is full of flavor, strong, fleshy and unfolds a truly suggestive range of tastes.

name: Prieto Picudo
description: Prieto Picudo grapes are indigenous of the province of Leon, the creeping grapevines are planted in the traditional “vaso” system or head-pruned. The fermentation was carried out in small stainless steel tanks to obtain its complexity after spending 15 months in French oak barrels.

name: Petit Verdot
description:
Attractive in the glass with an intense black cherry colour. Aromas reminiscent of
blackcurrants and blueberries, licorice, toffee and dark chocolate. Big in the mouth,
ample, revealing tannins that are direct and austere, typical of this variety and
forerunners of an incredible potential for ageing. A long, almost endless wine. A
refined, close to perfection Petit Verdot.

name: Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard Chacayes Cabernet Franc
RdP Spätburgunder
description: It is bouquet smells strongly after dark cherries, ripe plum, raisins, the finest chocolate and a hint of vanilla . On the palate very focused. These meaty, velvety creamy, dense fruit and wonderful depth and fullness. These are supported by a fine flavor with toasted toasty and beautiful minerality. Overall very complex, layered and a great, long finish. Just a terrific wine

name: Brunello di Montalcino Riserva Pianrosso Santa Caterina d'Oro
description: It has ruby red verging towards garnet. Fruit-forward, spicy and ethereal, with hints of red berries and various spices. Warm, harmonic with pronounced and soft tannins.

name: Appius
description: Straw yellow color with greenish reflections complex aromas hints and aromas of pineapple, papaya and passion fruit Mineral, complex, immensely long end.

name: Cerretta Barolo Riserva (Vigna Bricco)
description: Very intense ruby red with garnet reflections. Fresh to the nose with mature fruits, spicy, tobacco, darker fruits, and licorice. Warm and elegant, with minty and spicy notes.

name: Donna di Valiano Chardonnay
description: A wine with a complex bouquet in which very smooth and persistent fruity notes, particularly peach and pineapple, blend with those of vanilla, and butter coming from maturing in barriques. On the palate it presents a good, round and elegant structure. The finish is rewarding.

name: Ribera del Duero
description: It appears with hints of roast from the grape and top-quality wood. On the palate, the sweetened tannins of the concentrated black fruits blend with the dry creamy tannins of the French oak. It is full of flavor, strong, fleshy and unfolds a truly suggestive range of tastes.

name: PS (Pagos Seleccionados)
description: Very intense purple colour. Aromas of liquorice, tobacco, noble woods, spices, pain grillé and black berries. In the mouth, this wine offers density and structure, with plenty of silky tannins that provide finesse and elegance. Acidity and alcohol balance each other in a harmonious and lengthy wine.

name: Setz
description: Dark rubingranat with a aromas of black cherries, mint and spices of extraktreich, great fruit juices with a ripe of perfectly integrated tannins.

name: Georges De Latour Private Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
description: It has aromas of crushed blackberries, dark cherries, bittersweet chocolate and violet. The elegant dark-fruit flavors, supported by firm, supple tannins, pick up distinctive minerality on the palate.

name: Toro
description: Pintia is an elegant wine within the austerity of the region, i.e. delicate tannins embraced by the aroma of fresh fruit whilst avoiding overripeness and liquorice aromas.

name: Aconcagua Valley
description: Dark, dry red color. The scent has notes of berries, tobacco, cocoa, coconut and pepper. The flavor is intense, with a wealth of nuances and a very nice balance, which gives it a very classic French flavor.

name: Comtes de Champagne Blanc de Blancs
description: Its pure bouquet opens with a contrast between an already well-developed intensity and a finesse that reveals aromas of pears and white flowers. After a little time, the intensity presents the aromatic richness and maturity of a wine that is already expressing great potential.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A brilliant magenta color and expressive aromas of raspberry, plum, chocolate, brown spice and black pepper introduce the 2012 Estate Cabernet. A mouth-watering, sweet entry leads to a full-bodied wine that delivers rich, dark mountain fruit and plush tannins. This vintage promises early enjoyment.

name: Georges De Latour Private Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
description: It has aromas of crushed blackberries, dark cherries, bittersweet chocolate and violet. The elegant dark-fruit flavors, supported by firm, supple tannins, pick up distinctive minerality on the palate.

name: Tenuta Nuova Brunello di Montalcino
description: To the nose it has balsamic and red fruit notes, while in the mouth it shows itself with ripen and silky tannins which are supported by a vibrant finish.

name: Pian delle Vigne Vignaferrovia Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
Poggio alle Mura Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
description: Deep red color with just a garnet shade. The complex aromas are sweet, with scents of plum, ripe cherry and small red fruits, which are well integrated with tobacco and balsamic notes. In the mouth is full, with powerful but soft and pleasing tannins. Huge persistence in the finish and very much suitable for long aging.

name: Lupicaia
description: A heady bliend of crushed black cherry, blackberry and spice aromas precede plush blackcurrant, dark chocolate and mint-laced fruit with mineral aspect and a sculpting acity. Tannins are big, round and soft before an eternal finish.

name: Limestone Hill Malbec
description: It has a great aromatic intensity, offering red fruits, wild herbs and floral notes. This is a bold wine, with fine, silky tannins, refreshing acidity and minerality. A refined Malbec, with several layers of flavor, complex and expressive.

name: Merlot
description: Simply gorgeous red and black fruits,especially blueberries, raspberries, and hints of dried apricot.The mouth feel is so wonderfully plush, delicious, and expansive.

name: Ghè Barolo Riserva
description: Ruby red color. Intense aroma. Velvety flavour, dry, powerful and persistent.

name: Vigna Cappella di S. Stefano Perno Barolo
Brunello di Montalcino Riserva Madonna del Piano
Poggio all'Oro Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
description: Intense ruby red colour with garnet reflections, which show after long ageing. In the nose intense, enveloping, fruity and spicy with tobacco and chocolate notes. A full, austere, velvety and appropriately tannic mouthfeel.

name: Poggio all'Oro Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
description: Intense ruby red colour with garnet reflections, which show after long ageing. In the nose intense, enveloping, fruity and spicy with tobacco and chocolate notes. A full, austere, velvety and appropriately tannic mouthfeel.

name: Poggio Rosso Riserva
description: Intense ruby red colour highly pronounced bouquet with notes of plum, blackberry and raspberry. A wine of outstanding longevity and full flavour, with soft tannins and balanced acidity.

name: Toscana I Sodi di San Niccolo
description: It is especially dark, powerful and brooding. Black fruit, smoke, tar and incense are some of the many notes that flow from a structured, tense frame. I Sodi di San Niccolo is 85% Sangioveto and 15% Malvasia Nera aged in French oak barrels.

name: Ai Suma Barbera d'Asti
description: Ruby red color with garnet. Bouquet, rich and complex, with many hints of berries and background notes of vanilla, licorice and cocoa. Full, powerful, great structure but at the same time elegant and sensual, harmonious and very persistent. Accompanies meat dishes, roasts, also with sauces, seasoned cheeses.

name: Barbaresco Rabajà
description: Garnet red, intense and deep. Perfume that envelops the nose with hints of sweet wood (vanilla, hazelnut) and buttery notes that close then to the fruit of raspberry and cherry. Taste: warm, enveloping, with soft tannins and acids; elegant, luxurious aftertaste that lingers well with flavors already warned the nose.

name: Giorgio Primo
description: It has youthful on the eye, super deep purple and almost opaque to the rim. The nose offers up sweet plummy fruit and dried tea leaves. The palate is very fruit forward and super ripe blackberry flavours, sharp acidity, noticable alcohol and drying tannnins on the finish.

name: Merlot
description: Simply gorgeous red and black fruits,especially blueberries, raspberries, and hints of dried apricot.The mouth feel is so wonderfully plush, delicious, and expansive.

name: William Deutz Meurtet Pinot Noir Parcelles d’Aÿ Brut Champagne
Duemani Cabernet Franc
description: Cabernet Franc by careful selection in the vineyards, with great fruit, aristocratic tannins and complexity. The result is superb: mulberry, rosemary, brush and Mediterranean scrub. Sumptuous balance and impressive length.

name: Pietro Dal Cero Amarone della Valpolicella
description: This wine has a deep ruby red colour with black cherries, chocolate and sweet spices on the nose. As the wine breathes, balsamic notes emerge to reveal aniseed and wild mint aromas. It has great body and acidity, remarkable mineral elegance and prominent yet supple tannins. The finish is long and rounded with delicate hints of coffee and sweet tobacco.

name: Gran Corte (VII)
description: In color, the wine is an attractive, intense red with dark tones. It expresses fruit notes of plum, cherry, and dark fruits, with several spices like thyme, oregano, and black pepper, given by some of the components of the blend, which make the wine delicate and complex. On the palate it is elegant but structured, with a persistent finish.

name: Valpolicella Superiore Monte Lodoletta
description: This wine offers hints of blueberry, blackberry, cherry and chocolate which emerge gradually as the wine breathes. The potent tannins, which give structure to this product, are in perfect symbiosis with the velvety aromas of sweet spices and jam which envelop the palate and excite the senses.

name: William Deutz La Côte Glacière Pinot Noir Parcelle d'Aÿ Brut Champagne
Castello della Sala Cervaro della Sala
Douro Quinta da Manoella VV Tinto
description: Full-bodied and deeply concentrated, with a spicy and floral aroma, flavours of blackberry and dark chocolate. Ripe, round and balanced with a notable acidity, firm tannins and a long finish.

name: Pieve Santa Restituta Rennina Brunello di Montalcino
description: Intense color. Very clean, rich aromas, with notes of forest fruits,raspberries and blackberries that evolve into delicate spice and floral perfumes. A wine of excellent body, with alcohol balanced by silky tannins,Rennina has very good structure and a lingering finish.

name: Guardiavigna
description:
Red colour with violet nuances.To the nose it is rich and ranges from small fruits aromas to
blueberries,spicy notes and balsamic scents.To the palate it offers a precise tannin weave,deep but refined and well balanced with the acidity.Enchanting,soft and of a great complexity.The end is really persistent and mineral,expression of our Calcareous clay terroir.

name: Barolo Bricco Rocche
description: Delicate and harmonious in certain respects, powerful and robust in others, this is a demanding, complex and elegant wine. Its grandeur is revealed just a few months after bottling, and gradually increases as the floral aromas of its youth give way to ethereal spices, chocolate and truffle.

name: Lupicaia
description: A heady bliend of crushed black cherry, blackberry and spice aromas precede plush blackcurrant, dark chocolate and mint-laced fruit with mineral aspect and a sculpting acity. Tannins are big, round and soft before an eternal finish.

name: Brunello di Montalcino Riserva Madonna del Piano
Amarone della Valpolicella
description: Intense ruby red in colour with fine garnet at the rim. The nose is explosive with pleasant and intense aromas of chocolate, graphite, prune, chlorophyll and black truffle, followed by coffee, black pepper, nutmeg, bay leaves and rosemary.

name: Brunello di Montalcino
description: Deep ruby red with garnet nuances. Notes of red fruits with sharp aromas of liquorice, spices and black pepper. Sweetness in the attack is balanced by the fresh and lingering finish. In the mid palate, the wine is full bodied. The tannins are dense, well rounded and integrated.

name: Sed de Caná
description: Aromas on elegant,mineral, balsamic and spicy notes. This wine is wide,juicy and voluminous, and with a fine tour full of expression and balance. Long end.

name: Es Primitivo di Manduria
description: Intense ruby red wine. The nose a range of olfactory sensations surprised by their magnitude: we perceive elegant myrtle intertwining, jujubes, wild fruits, plum, carob, cocoa; the palate is intense, full flavor, important and persistent.

name: San Giovanni Barolo
description:
Deep ruby color with garnet. Fresh and vigorous, accompanied by fruity and spicy aromas.
Right balance between acidity, tannin and structure, persistent finish.

name: Merlot
description: Simply gorgeous red and black fruits,especially blueberries, raspberries, and hints of dried apricot.The mouth feel is so wonderfully plush, delicious, and expansive.

name: Valpolicella Superiore Monte Lodoletta
description: This wine offers hints of blueberry, blackberry, cherry and chocolate which emerge gradually as the wine breathes. The potent tannins, which give structure to this product, are in perfect symbiosis with the velvety aromas of sweet spices and jam which envelop the palate and excite the senses.

name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
description: Full ruby red color verging on garnet red after the ageing process.Has a strong and persistent scent of ripe red fruit, plum, cherry, marasca and almond.Full-bodied, intense and elegant, it clearly reminds us of our olfactory sensations, exalting the essences of vanilla, coffee and chocolate.

name: Ripe al Convento Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
description: Intense ruby-red. Notes of blackberry, intense and pleasant sensations of ground hazelnuts, rhubarb, and Cuban cigar, spicy notes of black pepper, cardamom and walnut, followed by fresh notes of thyme, tea leaves and juniper. Dense and elegant structure supported by generous, full body. The finish is merkedly long and balanced.

name: Il Caberlot
description: IL CABERLOT is made from 100% Caberlot, a variety believed to be a natural crossing of Cabernet Franc and Merlot. Fermentation in stainless steel, 22 months élevage in barrels from Burgundy, 16 months maturing in bottle prior to release. The wine is mainly bottled in magnums since the first vintage 1988, with an annual production of about 3.000 Mg.

name: Duemani Cabernet Franc
description: Cabernet Franc by careful selection in the vineyards, with great fruit, aristocratic tannins and complexity. The result is superb: mulberry, rosemary, brush and Mediterranean scrub. Sumptuous balance and impressive length.

name: Ribera Del Duero Reserva Premium 6 Anos
description: It has spicy vanilla and warm aromas. Intense dark fruit flavours with some leather and game. Long and persistent finish.

name: Tierra Alta de 2 Racimos Gran Reserva
'L Franc Bandit Vino da Tavola
description: This wine is elegant and beautifully balanced, rich yet smooth with medium body and supple tannins. Chocolate and cool earth notes on the nose, followed by cassis, tobacco and stewed plum flavours on the palate.Long and elegant finish.

name: Il Caberlot
description: IL CABERLOT is made from 100% Caberlot, a variety believed to be a natural crossing of Cabernet Franc and Merlot. Fermentation in stainless steel, 22 months élevage in barrels from Burgundy, 16 months maturing in bottle prior to release. The wine is mainly bottled in magnums since the first vintage 1988, with an annual production of about 3.000 Mg.

name: Vigna Grande Cerzito Taurasi Riserva
description: The nose strikes with its refined aromas of cherry, plum and chocolate, the palate sip becomes fleshy and delicate. Very long-lived wine, with the passage of years is completed by fresh notes of mint, eucalyptus and frankincense, becoming even more refined and elegant.

name: Vieille Vigne du Levant Champagne Grand Cru
Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Exudes power and elegance. Dense and focused with primary, bright, youthful, fresh characters. Plenty of ripe blue and red fruit accompanied by notes of mocha, carob, butterscotch, and toast. Long, clean, and fresh. Discernable tannins that are youthful yet lengthy complement the underlying intense fruit.

name: Gran Reserva
description: Bright cherry red high layer with slightly shingles trim.Aromas intense of primary type, fresh, well harmonized, combined with the derivatives of the aging in barrel. They emphasize aromas of red fruits confit and spiced with memories of mineral notes.Sensation of sweet and ripe tannins in the mouth. Mouth elegant, very balanced, harmonious, pleasing and long aftertaste.

name: Gran Reserva 890
description: Tile red colour. The initial aroma is both complex and powerful. In the mouth the wine is powerful and balanced with smooth and silky tannins coupled with a noteworthy light acidity. The aftertaste is full and very complex leaving the flavours full on the palate.

name: M1
description: Dark ruby with purple reflexes, with fine herbs and spices Coded Zwetschkenfrucht, delicate notes of tobacco, a hint of Dunkelbeerigen nuances, some candied orange zest, very tight and closely, fine texture, dark cherries on the finish, slightly salty in the aftertaste, fine tannins, great Development potential

name: 'Giulio Ferrari' Riserva del Fondatore
description: Elegant and well-balanced, with a velvety body and complex fruit: the nuances of acacia honey and hay blend well with the floral notes. The overall impact is aristocratic and of remarkable persistence.

name: La Grande Année Rosé Brut Champagne
description:
To the eye: salmon coloured with orange hues.
To the nose: red currant and almonds aromas followed by spicy and grilled notes ; flavours of
great Burgundy Pinot Noir.
To the palate: surprisingly wine-like but also very lively ; aromas of cherries, or kirsch, and
toasted bread.

name: Appius
description: Straw yellow color with greenish reflections complex aromas hints and aromas of pineapple, papaya and passion fruit Mineral, complex, immensely long end.

name: Valpolicella Superiore Monte Lodoletta
description: This wine offers hints of blueberry, blackberry, cherry and chocolate which emerge gradually as the wine breathes. The potent tannins, which give structure to this product, are in perfect symbiosis with the velvety aromas of sweet spices and jam which envelop the palate and excite the senses.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé)
description: Massive, round and silky, Pavia Decesse 2008 offers a bit more finesse and freshness than its predecessor. With aromas of cherries, black fruit and smoky notes, the mouth of a great affection plays his bold and depth to delight our taste buds. It is structured and amplitude amazing.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé)
description: Massive, round and silky, Pavia Decesse 2008 offers a bit more finesse and freshness than its predecessor. With aromas of cherries, black fruit and smoky notes, the mouth of a great affection plays his bold and depth to delight our taste buds. It is structured and amplitude amazing.

name: Meursault-Genevrières Premier Cru Cuvée Baudot
description: Slow ripening during the summer and early autumn has given a wine of real beauty. The aromas are very clean, fresh and ripe. The palate shows luscious richness, with gentle acidity and charmingly soft aftertaste.

name: Barolo Bricco Rocche
description: Delicate and harmonious in certain respects, powerful and robust in others, this is a demanding, complex and elegant wine. Its grandeur is revealed just a few months after bottling, and gradually increases as the floral aromas of its youth give way to ethereal spices, chocolate and truffle.

name: VIK
description: Ruby red, still very bright, deep. Red fruits aromas (strawberry, raspberry) layered with vanilla.

name: VIK
description: Ruby red, still very bright, deep. Red fruits aromas (strawberry, raspberry) layered with vanilla.

name: Saint-Aubin 1er Cru Sous Roche Dumay
description: It is beautiful dress, pretty clear, clear and very bright. Pale yellow with white gold highlights.It is pleasant Mouth. The attack is fresh and lively. Beautiful full and silky material. Wooded lightweight felt. The palate is quite powerful, and elegant. The alcohol is well integrated. Nice finish, long, balanced, fresh and palatable.

name: Château de Haute-Serre Malbec Icône Wow
Meredith Estate Pinot Noir
description: Classically proportioned, pure, firm, rich and juicy, with aromas of violet and wilted rose amid vivid blueberry, wild berry, raspberry, cedar and crushed rock notes. This is both firm and dense, gaining depth and persistence, with a long, tapered finish

name: Barolo Enrico VI
description: A Barolo of high standing, both austere and complex. Deep red garnet in color. Delicately spiced bouquet (notes of eucalyptus, licorice and menthol), mature fruit (liqueur soaked cherries, blackberries and prunes) and hints of violets and medicinal herbs. Powerful on the palate, lightly acidic and fresh. Lasting finish.

name: Ribera del Duero
description: It appears with hints of roast from the grape and top-quality wood. On the palate, the sweetened tannins of the concentrated black fruits blend with the dry creamy tannins of the French oak. It is full of flavor, strong, fleshy and unfolds a truly suggestive range of tastes.

name: Tenuta Nuova Brunello di Montalcino
description: To the nose it has balsamic and red fruit notes, while in the mouth it shows itself with ripen and silky tannins which are supported by a vibrant finish.

name: Pian delle Vigne Vignaferrovia Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
Volnay 1er Cru Les Caillerets
description: Rich dark fruits on the nose, more visible in the mouth with leather and spice

name: Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
description: Big, firm, warm and very well structured, with loads of ripe fruit. Dense, yet silky and smooth, greatly balanced and with an extremely long finish. This wine has a great aging potential.

name: Almaviva
description: Deep, intense, ruby red color with purple tones. Aromas of cassis, black berries and violet, notes of vanilla, cacao, licorice, and spices.

name: Aconcagua Valley
description: Dark, dry red color. The scent has notes of berries, tobacco, cocoa, coconut and pepper. The flavor is intense, with a wealth of nuances and a very nice balance, which gives it a very classic French flavor.

name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape Réserve Secrète
description: It has powerful wine, elegant and refined, intense nose of blackberries, cassis and toffee. The smooth palate of this wine beautifully mixes the milk jam aromas, tan and cedar. The final, liquorice, intense and persistent.

name: Finn Pinot Noir
description: Multi-dimensional aromas: swirling red, blue and black fruits, packed full of oriental spices, tobacco leaf and dried flower notes. Great definition on the palate. Intense black cherry, sweet thyme, orange peel, tangy rhubarb and dusty cocoa powder. Tremendously complex wine with lovely mid-palate generosity. Broad chewy tannins offsets the fruit richness. Linear acid to finish with dark tapenade and licorice notes. Decant for an hour and drink between 2016 and 2023.

name: Bodega Freestone Occidental Pinot Noir
description: On the palate the wine opens with bright acidity backed by youthful, fine grained tannins. Flavors of wild dark berries, and crushed stone lead to a wonderfully long finish.

name: Finn Pinot Noir
description: Multi-dimensional aromas: swirling red, blue and black fruits, packed full of oriental spices, tobacco leaf and dried flower notes. Great definition on the palate. Intense black cherry, sweet thyme, orange peel, tangy rhubarb and dusty cocoa powder. Tremendously complex wine with lovely mid-palate generosity. Broad chewy tannins offsets the fruit richness. Linear acid to finish with dark tapenade and licorice notes. Decant for an hour and drink between 2016 and 2023.

name: Blueline Estate Cabernet Sauvignon
description: It has one of the most deeply concentrated vintages of Blueline Cab we have crafted, and yet it exhibits a strong presence of nervy minerality in the back mid-palate, providing lift and brightness to the overall richness. An incredibly tight weave of refined tannins holds the center core firmly in place, wrapped as it is with a lush layer of black fruit. Blackberry bramble and cassis are infused with a crushed stone character that brightens the richness across the palate and lingers for a long arching finish.

name: Bibbona
description: Cherries, black currants, blackberries, chocolate, coffee, black pepper. Velvety tannins and a good acidity give backbone and structure to the rich flavors. The wine has a seamless balance with a long and fine finish.

name: Chardonnay Ma Princesse
description: It has aromas of lemon drop, reinette apple skin and fresh herbs (chamomile). Full-bodied and concentrated, this wine displays a creamy and rich texture which coats the palate for a very long time.

name: Series C
description: Deep and concentrated with multiple layers of dark chocolate, espresso bean, blackberry and dark cherry flavors. Deep, dark oak flavors integrate with primary and secondary fruit flavors to deliver a balanced wine with great aging potential.

name: Tinto
description: Aromas ripe fruit.in the mouth the tannins are silky, with notes of vanilla and fruits in liquor. Elegant and with character

name: Trasnocho
description: Cherry red, quite dark and dense showing a ruby red rim. Many aromatics, predominance of slightly candied black fruit reminiscent of plums, blackberries and cassis. Excellent structure with great intensity.

name: Aconcagua Valley
description: Dark, dry red color. The scent has notes of berries, tobacco, cocoa, coconut and pepper. The flavor is intense, with a wealth of nuances and a very nice balance, which gives it a very classic French flavor.

name: Tinto
description: Ruby red in color with purple reflections, this very intense wine reveals complex and expressive aromas of red fruits raspberry, blackcurrant citrus zests, spices and truffles. By carrafant, floral aromas of rose and orange blossom will appear. In mouth it is frank, structured and pure. Its mineral character gives it a lot of freshness and finesse. An admirable, elegant, powerful wine that will give you in the mouth an incredible explosion of flavors.

name: Reserva Especial
description: Complex and intense nose of very ripe red fruits (plum, bilberry, jam tomato) and an elegant symphony of ageing aromas (vanilla, cacao). Tasty and of grand expression palate, round, fleshy and well structured.

name: Petit Verdot
description:
Attractive in the glass with an intense black cherry colour. Aromas reminiscent of
blackcurrants and blueberries, licorice, toffee and dark chocolate. Big in the mouth,
ample, revealing tannins that are direct and austere, typical of this variety and
forerunners of an incredible potential for ageing. A long, almost endless wine. A
refined, close to perfection Petit Verdot.

name: Saffredi
description: Impenetrable ruby red, a beautiful density in the glass. The scents go from red fruits, red currant, blackberries and spices such as cloves, cinnamon and chocolate. In the palate the wine is well-rounded and velvety, engaging all senses with majestic balance. The long persistence allows to fully enjoy the aromatic complexity, in which the spiciness is prevalent.

name: Alàuda
description: Intense ruby red with purplish overtones. Vinous and inviting with smooth fruity notes, well integrated, soft tannins and vibrant acidity. The aftertaste is long-lasting and remeniscent of wild cherries and thyme.

name: RdP Spätburgunder
description: It is bouquet smells strongly after dark cherries, ripe plum, raisins, the finest chocolate and a hint of vanilla . On the palate very focused. These meaty, velvety creamy, dense fruit and wonderful depth and fullness. These are supported by a fine flavor with toasted toasty and beautiful minerality. Overall very complex, layered and a great, long finish. Just a terrific wine

name: RdP Spätburgunder
description: It is bouquet smells strongly after dark cherries, ripe plum, raisins, the finest chocolate and a hint of vanilla . On the palate very focused. These meaty, velvety creamy, dense fruit and wonderful depth and fullness. These are supported by a fine flavor with toasted toasty and beautiful minerality. Overall very complex, layered and a great, long finish. Just a terrific wine

name: Barón de Chirel Reserva
description: Lovely black-cherry colour dark and deep-robed. Powerful aromatic intensity, in which the spicy, toasted character from the Allier oak stand out. Jammy dark-berried fruit. Fresh, creamy palate, smooth, elegant tannins and a long, balanced finish.

name: Barbera d'Asti Riserva della Famiglia
description: It has deep ruby. It has elegant notes of balsamic, thyme and underbrush. It has massive, long-persistence.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Dense garnet color accompanies an alluring nose, abundant with cassis, white pepper and tobacco leaf. Concentrated flavors of blackberry, graphite and bittersweet cocoa explode over a velvety palate, interweaving with ripe, supple, well-integrated tannins and notes of cedar and toast to create a memorable finish.

name: Diesel Pinotage
description: Deep dark red. Bouquet of rich blackcurrant, dark cherries, prunes and ceder oak aromas. A complex middle leads to a smooth finish with cedar flavours from the oak.

name: Faith
description: It has dark ruby red colour with bright edges. Upfront bouquet with dark fruit and plum aromas with subtle cedar and mocha oak on the nose. Intense blackberry, cassis and plum flavours upon entry with delicate spice and cedar aromas from the new French oak. A big structured, well rounded and elegantly balanced Cape blend. Hints of mocha and dark chocolate compliment a great finish.

name: Series C
description: Deep and concentrated with multiple layers of dark chocolate, espresso bean, blackberry and dark cherry flavors. Deep, dark oak flavors integrate with primary and secondary fruit flavors to deliver a balanced wine with great aging potential.

name: Faith
description: It has dark ruby red colour with bright edges. Upfront bouquet with dark fruit and plum aromas with subtle cedar and mocha oak on the nose. Intense blackberry, cassis and plum flavours upon entry with delicate spice and cedar aromas from the new French oak. A big structured, well rounded and elegantly balanced Cape blend. Hints of mocha and dark chocolate compliment a great finish.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Cabernet Sauvignon shows not A trace of oak and has amazingly sweet blueberry and Blackberry fruit in the nose, along with some licorice, Incense, and charcoal embers. The color is opaque to The rim, and the wine full-bodied, with the blue fruits Dominating on the palate.

name: Altura
description: Live and intense deep ruby colour. On the nose, elegant and complex with notes of ripe red fruits, blackberry and dried plums. Excellent balance between French oak and fruit. On the palate, intense, full, rich and expressive. Round and with elegant tannins, which lead through to a very long and harmonious finish.

name: LR
description: Intense straw-yellow colour, LR has a fruity bouquet reminiscent of tropical fruits. Full bodied on the palate, the wine has a lot of character and a long long finish.

name: Scharzhofberger Riesling Kabinett
description: It boasts grassy, lime aromas and plenty of tart, citrusy, green-apple fruit. It’s a wine with piercing acidity and fresh, sweet fruit.

name: LR
description: Intense straw-yellow colour, LR has a fruity bouquet reminiscent of tropical fruits. Full bodied on the palate, the wine has a lot of character and a long long finish.

name: Brunello di Montalcino  Montosoli
description: It has a deep ruby red colour which turns a garnet red with age. Its bouquet has outstanding character with hints of black cherry, blackberries, raspberries, violet, liquorice, vanilla and a slight accent of pink peppercorn.

name: La Grande Année Brut Champagne
description: La Grande Année is a refined, elegant wine with pretty, exotic notes of apricots, peaches, honey, flowers, smoke, and toasted oak. There is a notable clarity and precision, in a style that is generous and approachable.

name: Valpolicella Superiore Monte Lodoletta
description: This wine offers hints of blueberry, blackberry, cherry and chocolate which emerge gradually as the wine breathes. The potent tannins, which give structure to this product, are in perfect symbiosis with the velvety aromas of sweet spices and jam which envelop the palate and excite the senses.

name: Curriculum Vitae Douro (CV)
description: Upfront, floral, creamy and plush dark fruit – seems quite modern in style. The juicy palate has a spicy, tarry character and fine powdery tannins.

name: Chateauneuf-du-Pape La Combe Des Fous
description: It has a hints of vanilla, incense and cola. fleshy,mineral-laced raspberry and blueberry flavors gain sweet ness and depth with air, picking up suave notes of lavender and allspice.finishes silky and extremely long, with resonating spiciness and smooth, harmonious tannins.

name: Pieve Santa Restituta Rennina Brunello di Montalcino
description: Intense color. Very clean, rich aromas, with notes of forest fruits,raspberries and blackberries that evolve into delicate spice and floral perfumes. A wine of excellent body, with alcohol balanced by silky tannins,Rennina has very good structure and a lingering finish.

name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Merlot (Signature)
description:
A combination of savory lavender, cinnamon stick and dark cherry aromas introduce this distinctive Merlot. Luscious blackberry, plum, espresso and earthy dark chocolate avors are supported by ripe and rened tannins. The resulting wine displays a satisfying textural
component with great depth and fruit concentration.

name: Barolo Riserva Bricco Voghera
description: In the vineyard of the Reserve Bricco Voghera the screws with more than 75 years producing grapes only. Concentration incredible. Dried flowers, dried fruit, freshness and great aromatic intensity. Black cherry, plum, blackberry with pink, purple and dark chocolate. Round tannins, generous, with an infinite length. Aging in oak and bottled prolonged. Elegance, charm and power. Each reserve is a reserve to remember.

name: Brunello di Montalcino Riserva
description: It contains elegant and well balanced, powerful, but clean and smooth and a dynamic rising finale.

name: Duemani Cabernet Franc
description: Cabernet Franc by careful selection in the vineyards, with great fruit, aristocratic tannins and complexity. The result is superb: mulberry, rosemary, brush and Mediterranean scrub. Sumptuous balance and impressive length.

name: Valpolicella Superiore Monte Lodoletta
description: This wine offers hints of blueberry, blackberry, cherry and chocolate which emerge gradually as the wine breathes. The potent tannins, which give structure to this product, are in perfect symbiosis with the velvety aromas of sweet spices and jam which envelop the palate and excite the senses.

name: Campo Inferi Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva
Riesling 'Le Gallais' Wiltinger Braune Kupp Auslese
Aconcagua Valley
description: Dark, dry red color. The scent has notes of berries, tobacco, cocoa, coconut and pepper. The flavor is intense, with a wealth of nuances and a very nice balance, which gives it a very classic French flavor.

name: Volnay 1er Cru Les Caillerets
description: Rich dark fruits on the nose, more visible in the mouth with leather and spice

name: Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé)
description: Very intense colour. Very intense nose, marked by notes of cherry, blackberry and redcurrant with traces of vanilla, liquorice and cedar. The attack is full to the palate. The tannins of great smoothness reveal a fine elegance. The finish, with no trace of aggressiveness, is marked by a good length.

name: Sella del Leccio Rosso di Montalcino
Ribera del Duero
description: It appears with hints of roast from the grape and top-quality wood. On the palate, the sweetened tannins of the concentrated black fruits blend with the dry creamy tannins of the French oak. It is full of flavor, strong, fleshy and unfolds a truly suggestive range of tastes.

name: FAY Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A fragrant nose of ripe blackberry and raspberry along with notes of sweet fig, cinnamon and violet. The palate is elegant with silky tannins and a core of rich fruit with a hint of crème brulee. The wine finishes with a lingering berry pie character.

name: Gran Enemigo Single Vineyard Gualtallary Cabernet Franc
description: Adrianna and I make it in honor of the old Pomerol style where Cabernet Franc was blended with the other Bordeaux varieties," says Alejandro.

name: Soul of a Lion
description: Soul of a Lion is DAOU’s crown jewel, named after the father of Georges and Daniel Daou. A deep, complex bouquet reveals notes of cassis, black currant, liquorice, incense, ripe plum, and vanilla. The palate is full-bodied, layered and complex, while smooth, silky tannins lead to a persistent finish. This wine is a wine of power, complexity and imagination, and a fitting tribute to the man and the father.

name: Malbec Argentino
description:
The bold and inky Catena Zapata Malbec Argentino is a renowned Argentine wine that exemplifies the unique characteristics of Malbec, a grape variety that thrives in the region. With its unique flavor profile, predominantly of black fruit, but with earthy and oaky undertones, this wine boasts a smooth and velvety texture with well-integrated tannins, providing a satisfying and long-lasting finish.

The thorough fermentation process at the Catena Zapata winery is conducted in small batches to maintain control and enhance the flavors.The wine is then aged in a combination of French and American oak barrels to add complexity and depth. Head winemaker, Alejandro Vigil, has been at Catena Zapata for over 20 years, and consistently strives to channel his creative energy into pushing the limits of conventional viticultural and winemaking wisdom. The result is a truly exceptional Malbec that stands as a testament to the artistry and expertise of Argentine winemaking.

With thousands of trusted reviews, Catena Zapata Malbec Argentino is a Vivino community favorite, with one member suggesting this ‘amazing Argentine red is the smoothest I’ve ever had!’ and another naming it ‘a big fruit bomb!’ with ‘amazing juiciness!’

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Classic, three-chord composition provides structure with notes of cedar, clove and sweet tobacco for added melody. Finely polished with chocolaty tannins.

name: Five Generations Cabernet Sauvignon
description: It has aromas of blackcurrant and cassis, layered with dark chocolate and cherry tobacco. A velvety texture that lingers on the palate with a distinct blackcurrant aftertaste.

name: One Point Five Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Aromas of crushed red and black summer berries, rose petal and herbs. In the mouth the generous, lush black and red fruits integrate enticingly with sage, tobacco leaf, smoke and black spice all wrapped within a structure of ripe Stags Leap District tannins.

name: Gran VU Blend
description: It brings a great, intense, complex but delicate aromatic expression with aromas of black fruits, licorice and mint.To the mouth, it brings well-structured tannins. It is strong, elegant and with a fresh and long finish.

name: Mirabilis Tinto
description: Mirabilis Grande Reserva Tinto has an intense and complex nose, with notes of black fruits and spices. Elegant, very concentrated and sophisticated, with a great balance between texture, acidity, and structure, resulting in a long, intense and lingering finish.

name: Gran Lombardo Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
description: Intense ruby red color bouquet of exceptional elegance,a hint of ripe fruit and delicate spices . Enveloping tannins soft and ripe.

name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva (Sergio Zenato)
description: Rich aromas of cherries, strawberries with just a subtle hint of earth and leather. Absolutely coats your mouth with classic Amarone sweetness, raisins, dark cherry, chocolate.

name: Soul of a Lion
description: Soul of a Lion is DAOU’s crown jewel, named after the father of Georges and Daniel Daou. A deep, complex bouquet reveals notes of cassis, black currant, liquorice, incense, ripe plum, and vanilla. The palate is full-bodied, layered and complex, while smooth, silky tannins lead to a persistent finish. This wine is a wine of power, complexity and imagination, and a fitting tribute to the man and the father.

name: Pinot Noir
description: Lifted with bing cherry, red plum and pomegranate. Notes of framboise, dried earth and savory herb can also be found. Powerful mid-palate with tannic grip and texture that is also graceful but rich. Flavours of strawberry and violets coat the palate. The finish is focused, long and structured.

name: Sweetwater Pinot Noir
description: Deep ruby. Pungent, smoke-accented aromas of cherry and dark berries, with cola and licorice accents. Weighty and chewy in texture, offering powerful cherry-cola and black raspberry flavors and an energizing note of white pepper Closes with excellent clarity and length, leaving notes of mocha and cola behind. The most masculine of this year's set of pinots from Rochioli and the one most in need of patience.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Deep berry aromas and flavors accented by notes of anise and bittersweet chocolate. Classic, full-on Howell Mountain texture supports this wine right through the lengthy finish and will allow it to age for decades in the bottle.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Deep berry aromas and flavors accented by notes of anise and bittersweet chocolate. Classic, full-on Howell Mountain texture supports this wine right through the lengthy finish and will allow it to age for decades in the bottle.

name: Campogiovanni Brunello di Montalcino Riserva Il Quercione
description: Intense ruby red, with a penetrating bouquet of mature wild berries, spices, cocoa and leather. Full, warm, austere flavour, with sweet and succulent tannins.

name: Brunello di Montalcino Riserva Madonna del Piano
Amarone della Valpolicella Classico Riserva (Sergio Zenato)
description: Rich aromas of cherries, strawberries with just a subtle hint of earth and leather. Absolutely coats your mouth with classic Amarone sweetness, raisins, dark cherry, chocolate.

name: Guardiavigna
description:
Red colour with violet nuances.To the nose it is rich and ranges from small fruits aromas to
blueberries,spicy notes and balsamic scents.To the palate it offers a precise tannin weave,deep but refined and well balanced with the acidity.Enchanting,soft and of a great complexity.The end is really persistent and mineral,expression of our Calcareous clay terroir.

name: Bibbona
description: Cherries, black currants, blackberries, chocolate, coffee, black pepper. Velvety tannins and a good acidity give backbone and structure to the rich flavors. The wine has a seamless balance with a long and fine finish.

name: Brunello di Montalcino Riserva Pianrosso Santa Caterina d'Oro
description: It has ruby red verging towards garnet. Fruit-forward, spicy and ethereal, with hints of red berries and various spices. Warm, harmonic with pronounced and soft tannins.

name: Finca Las Naves
description: Dark black-purple colour. Intense, aromatic and attractive nose with wild berries, wild herbs, flowers and subtle earthiness with spicy-toasty notes. On the palate this wine is rich and dense with wild berries, wild herbs, spicy flavours and hints of reduction, supported by lovely savory tannins and a long finish.

name: Rioja Reserva
description: Deep, bright black-cherry colour with lighter cherry hues at the rim. Very subtle aromas of cranberries and minerals. Perfect integration of the oak in which fine hints of vanilla and creamy touches appear while respecting the primary fruit aromas. An elegant palate and finesse in the finish.

name: La Mula de la Quietud
description: Colour of picota cherry red dark high density. Aromas of ripe black fruit ageing notes, toasty notes spicy notes and balsamic notes. Palate is powerful complex of elegant fruit notes, silky tannins and long finish.

name: Mauro VS
description: This wine is deep red and rich. The nose is balsamic and fruity. It is a strong wine with a marked structure. There are robust tannins. It is flavoursome with elegant mineral undertones. The aftertaste is long and persistent.

name: Revival Godello
description: Yellow color with fresh. nose is aromatic intensity in fruity aromas stand out citrus, lime, pink grapefruit the white fruit, apple and memories of fruit the peach. the mouth is intensity, persistence and balanced acidity the silky and enveloping a great aromatic finish.

name: Reserva Particular de Recaredo Gran Reserva Brut Nature
200 Monges Rioja Gran Reserva
description: It is very deep cherry red, bright and with a hint of tawny at the rim. Exceptionally aromatic on the nose, with aromas of ripe fruit or compote, and balsamic overtones. Mouth-filling weight with rich nuances, soft, velvety tannins and hints of black fruit, superbly harmonised in their aromatic complexity

name: Coleccion Jaime Rodriguez Granja Nuestra Senora de Remulleri
Les Prémices Brut Champagne Grand Cru 'Ambonnay'
Pago Negralada
description: Impressive colour in the glass, intense and young. Opens up on the nose, offering veryclean notes of wild herbs and ripe (almost preserve) red fruit (wild strawberry, raspberry and cherry), delicately creamy. In the mouth, the attack is very smooth, moving immediately on to unveil a very deep wine, fleshy and structured, with an impacting return to the fruit, although the highlight is perhaps its noblesse, maturity and refined tannins. Bold, persistent and full of character.

name: 5º Año Ribera del Duero Tinto
description: Pretty cherry red, very covered and shiny. Mature black fruit in the plum line and blackberry, mineral notes such as graphite, spices with pepper, vanilla and cedar, subtle and fine touches of black licorice, chocolate sensation, very balsamic.

name: Puligny-Montrachet 1er Cru Truffiéres
description: Flowery aroma with a hint of honeysuckle. A frivolous mouth, tense with racy minerality.

name: Triga
description: Purple opaque. Explosive aromas of black and blue fruits are transformed into notes of licorice, Indian spices and floral oils. Rico and long, has good acidity that adds elegance. On the palate, sweet cranberries and currants stain the palate with a spicy persistence and final concentrate.

name: Petit Verdot
description:
Attractive in the glass with an intense black cherry colour. Aromas reminiscent of
blackcurrants and blueberries, licorice, toffee and dark chocolate. Big in the mouth,
ample, revealing tannins that are direct and austere, typical of this variety and
forerunners of an incredible potential for ageing. A long, almost endless wine. A
refined, close to perfection Petit Verdot.

name: Hacienda Pradolagar
description: Deep intense black cherry colour with violet rims and brick red hues. Bouquet is rich and balanced with complex aromas of ripe fruit, blackcurrant, wild cherry, coffee, liquorice and smoky undertones. Spicy tones and excellent oak balance. Full bodied and elegant palate due to a perfect balance between the tannins of the grapes, the oak and the acidity. Richly textured with powerful tannins and lingering finish.

name: Malleolus de Valderramiro
description: Intense ripe cherry-red colour, with dark tones at the heart. The nose is opulent and intense, dominated by black fruits and a marked minerality, accompanied by toasted aromas of fine oak. A great complexity of spicy and sweet nuances. On the palate it is a powerful ensemble, persistent with a silky tannin that envelopes the palate. The finish is long and persistent, and lingers on the palate.

name: Flor de Pingus
description: The wine is very aromatic and expressive, floral and spicy, with the oak nicely folded into ripe fruit. It's powerful and full-bodied showing also approachability and appeal. The tannins are very fine and the finish is quite remarkable.

name: 3er Año Ribera del Duero Tinto
description: Red cherry color, very covered and bright. Black and red fruit in season, with predominance of red plums and cherries typical of high and cold areas, sweet and fine spices with aromas of mountain bass and understory assembled to elegant roasted oak aromas.

name: Culmen Reserva Rioja
description: Intense and bright cherry colour. Aromas of very ripe plums, blackberries as balsamic and pastry notes. Spicy hints, nutmeg, cinnamon and smoked. Mineral notes which is a peculiarity from our vineyards type of soils.

name: Trasnocho
description: Cherry red, quite dark and dense showing a ruby red rim. Many aromatics, predominance of slightly candied black fruit reminiscent of plums, blackberries and cassis. Excellent structure with great intensity.

name: Rioja Reserva
description: Deep, bright black-cherry colour with lighter cherry hues at the rim. Very subtle aromas of cranberries and minerals. Perfect integration of the oak in which fine hints of vanilla and creamy touches appear while respecting the primary fruit aromas. An elegant palate and finesse in the finish.

name: Saint-Emilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
description: It is an extremely concentrated, well-structured wine with a long aftertaste, very deep colour, and superb balance.

name: Les Chemins Champagne Grand Cru 'Avize'
description: Pale gold in color, it is beautifully Focused with expressive aromas of lime, lemon, ripe pear and honeysuckle, qui are repeated on the palate with a persistent finish Gloriously.
